EVTDESC1010033;찰스 스튜어트 파넬이 유부녀인 캐서린 오시어와의 부적절한 관계를 가졌으며 그녀의 이후 이혼에 대한 책임이 있다는 사실이 밝혀졌습니다. 이 추문은 그의 정치경력을 끝장냈으며 그가 자치안건을 밀어붙일 동력을 고갈시켰습니다. 그가 없는 아일랜드 공화국 운동은 자치법안을 재통과시킬 정치적 영향력을 얻을 것 같지 않습니다.;The revelation that Charles Stewart Parnell has been involved with a married woman
column2: one Catherine O'Shea
column3: and indeed is responsible for her subsequent divorce
column4: was the scandal that ended his political career and prevented him from pushing the Home Rule agenda. Without him
column5: it appears unlikely that the Irish Republican movement will gain the political clout it requires to attempt another passing of the Home Rule Bill.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME11380019;헌법 위기;Constitutional Crisis;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC11380019;갑작스런 선거 승리로 파쇼들이 정부를 장악했습니다. 이들의 궁극적인 목표는 $COUNTRY$ 정부를 인수하는 것입니다. 이번 선거의 승리는 단지 첫걸음일 뿐이라는 우려가 있으며
column2: 일부에선 부정선거의 가능성까지 제기하고 있습니다. $COUNTRY$ 사람들은 말합니다. 군주는 많은 사람들이 예상하는대로 개입해서 파쇼들을 쫓아낼지
column3: 개입하지 않음으로써 권력이 없음을 인정하고 정부에 대한 모든 통제권을 포기할지를 결정해야 한다고 말입니다.;In a surprise election win
column4: the fascists have taken power in the government. Technically they are allowed to do so
column5: and their party has not been banned. There are concerns
column6: however
column7: that their ultimate goal is to take over the $COUNTRY$ government and that this election win is just the first step in doing so. Some are even suggesting the possibility of voter fraud. Regardless
column8: the $COUNTRY$ people have spoken... and the monarchy must decide whether to intervene and refuse the fascists their mandate as many expect. Failure to intervene means admitting that they have no power and thus relinquishing all control over the government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC11380020;갑작스런 선거 승리로 공산주의자들이 정부를 장악했습니다. 이들의 궁극적인 목표는 $COUNTRY$ 정부를 인수하는 것입니다. 이번 선거의 승리는 단지 첫걸음일 뿐이라는 우려가 있으며
column2: 일부에선 부정선거의 가능성까지 제기하고 있습니다. $COUNTRY$ 사람들은 말합니다. 군주는 많은 사람들이 예상하는대로 개입해서 공산주의자들을 쫓아낼지
column3: 개입하지 않음으로써 권력이 없음을 인정하고 정부에 대한 모든 통제권을 포기할지를 결정해야 한다고 말입니다.;In a surprise election win
column4: the communists have taken power in the government. Technically they are allowed to do so
column5: and their party has not been banned. There are concerns
column6: however
column7: that their ultimate goal is to take over the $COUNTRY$ government and that this election win is just the first step in doing so. Some are even suggesting the possibility of voter fraud. Regardless
column8: the $COUNTRY$ people have spoken... and the monarchy must decide whether to intervene and refuse the communists their mandate as many expect. Failure to intervene means admitting that they have no power and thus relinquishing all control over the government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC11380021;갑작스런 선거 승리로 아나르코자본주의자들이 정부를 장악했습니다. 이들의 궁극적인 목표는 $COUNTRY$ 정부를 인수하는 것입니다. 이번 선거의 승리는 단지 첫걸음일 뿐이라는 우려가 있으며
column2: 일부에선 부정선거의 가능성까지 제기하고 있습니다. $COUNTRY$ 사람들은 말합니다. 군주는 많은 사람들이 예상하는대로 개입해서 공화주의자들을 쫓아낼지
column3: 개입하지 않음으로써 권력이 없음을 인정하고 정부에 대한 모든 통제권을 포기할지를 결정해야 한다고 말입니다.;In a surprise election win
column4: the anarcho-liberals have taken power in the government. Technically they are allowed to do so
column5: and their party has not been banned. There are concerns
column6: however
column7: that their ultimate goal is to take over the $COUNTRY$ government and that this election win is just the first step in doing so. Some are even suggesting the possibility of voter fraud. Regardless
column8: the $COUNTRY$ people have spoken... and the monarchy must decide whether to intervene and refuse these radical republicans their mandate as many expect. Failure to intervene means admitting that they have no power and thus relinquishing all control over the government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC11380022;군주제에 반대한다는 이유로 금지한 공산주의자들이 선거에서 깜짝 승리하며 정권을 장악했습니다. 선거개혁을 재고하고 권력을 제자리에 돌려놓을 때가 온 것 같습니다.;In a surprise election win
column2: the communists have taken power in the government -- despite the fact that their party opposes the monarchy and has been banned. Regardless
column3: the $COUNTRY$ people have spoken
column4: and thus a political showdown has resulted: the communists cannot be permitted to win
column5: but even if they're refused the next election might simply have the same crisis occur all over again. Perhaps the time has come to reconsider electoral reforms and put the power back where it belongs?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC11380023;군주제에 반대한다는 이유로 금지한 아나르코자본주의자들이 선거에서 깜짝 승리하며 정권을 장악했습니다. 선거개혁을 재고하고 권력을 제자리에 돌려놓을 때가 된 것 같습니다.;In a surprise election win
column2: the anarcho-liberals have taken power in the government -- despite the fact that their party opposes the monarchy and has been banned. Regardless
column3: the $COUNTRY$ people have spoken
column4: and thus a political showdown has resulted: these radical republicans cannot be permitted to win
column5: but even if they're refused the next election might simply have the same crisis occur all over again. Perhaps the time has come to reconsider electoral reforms and put the power back where it belongs?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME152009872;$YEAR$년 정변?;$COUNTRY$ Coup?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC152009872;$COUNTRY$군 내 장교들 간에 불안감이 자리잡았습니다. 이들 중 일부는 적극적으로 계급간 불화를 확산시키고 있습니다. 그들은 현재 지도부보다는 군대의 통치가 더 나을 것이라고 말합니다. 그들은 문민정부가 매우 비효율적인 것으로 판명났다고 말합니다. 그리고 그들의 지휘를 받는 많은 사병들도 이에 동의하는 것 같습니다.;There is unrest among $COUNTRY$ officers in the military
column2: enough that some of them are actively spreading dissension among the ranks. $COUNTRY$ would be better served
column3: they say
column4: if the army was in charge rather than the current leadership -- elected it may be
column5: but according to them it has proven too ineffective. And it seems many of the men under their command agree.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME152009873;$YEAR$년 군사정변;The $COUNTRY$ Military Coup;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC152009873;$COUNTRY$군이 $CAPITAL$ 정부청사 방면으로 진격했습니다. 국군의 의무대로 정부를 보호하기 위해서가 아니라
column2: 지도부를 축출하고 새로운 통치자로 군림하기 위해서입니다. 그들은 $COUNTRY$이(가) '격변' 상태이며
column3: 오직 군대만이 질서를 회복할 수 있다고 주장합니다.;$COUNTRY$ army forces in $CAPITAL$ have made their way toward the government buildings -- not to protect the $COUNTRY$ government as is their duty
column4: but instead to oust our leaders and install themselves as $COUNTRY$'s new rulers. They claim that $COUNTRY$ is in a state of 'upheaval'
column5: and only the army can restore order.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reform_CSA_title;Form the New Confederacy;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reform_CSA_desc;If the North will not stand for truth and justice
column2: then the South shall rise and take its place!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_new_CSA_title;Join the Confederacy;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_new_CSA_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the new Confederate banner. Long live the South!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_FSA_title;Form the Free States of America;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_FSA_desc;If the USA will not stand for truth and justice
column2: then the FSA shall rise and take its place!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_FSA_title;Join the FSA;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_FSA_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the new FSA banner. Long live the Sons of Liberty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_california_title;Join California;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_california_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the California banner. Long live the Sons of Liberty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_new_america_title;Join New America;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_new_america_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the New America banner. Long live the Sons of Liberty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
rejoin_usa_title;Rejoin the Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
rejoin_usa_desc;With the American government restored to democracy
column2: our people have decided it is time to rejoin the Union. Let the United States be restored to the destiny it was meant for!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: exile_house_of_saud_title;Banish the House of Saud;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
exile_house_of_saud_desc;We are victorious over the House of Saud. We must send them into exile
column2: so that Arabia stands united under a single flag: our own.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: exile_house_of_rashid_title;Banish the House of Rashid;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
exile_house_of_rashid_desc;We are victorious over the House of Rashid. We must send them into exile
column2: so that Arabia stands united under a single flag: our own.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_nejd_title;Claim Nejd;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_nejd_desc;We cannot unite all of Arabia under our banner unless we control the central provinces. The House of Rashid must stand dominant!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_hail_title;Claim Ha'il;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_hail_desc;We cannot unite all of Arabia under our banner unless we control the northern provinces. The House of Saud must stand dominant!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_hedjaz_NEJ_title;Claim Hedjaz;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_hedjaz_NEJ_desc;We must claim the western lands in Hedjaz if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_hedjaz_HAL_title;Claim Hedjaz;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_hedjaz_HAL_desc;We must claim the western lands in Hedjaz if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabia_HDJ_title;Claim Eastern Arabia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabia_HDJ_desc;We must claim the eastern lands in Nejd and Hail if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabia_ASR_title;Claim Northern Arabia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabia_ASR_desc;We must claim the rest of the peninsula if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabian_peninsula_title;Claim Greater Arabia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabian_peninsula_desc;We must unite all of the Arabian peninsula under our rule
column2: including all of the Trucial States
column3: Oman

column1: become_saudi_arabia_title;Become Arabia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_saudi_arabia_desc;We must reunite Nejd and Hedjaz under a single flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_saudi_arabia_title;Form Arabia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_saudi_arabia_desc;A united arab nation under our rule will make a strong and stable ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
encourage_arab_nationalism_title;Encourage Arab Nationalism;;;;;;;;;;;;x

encourage_arab_nationalism_desc;The way to truly fight the Ottoman Empire is to dismantle it from within. We must encourage their Arab minorities to rise up and seek their own destiny as independent nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
ibn_saud_title;Ibn Saud;;;;;;;;;;;;x
ibn_saud_desc;The time has come to unite all of the Arabian peninsula under our rule. Hedjaz must be taken
column2: in order for the Saudi nation to truly stand on its own.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_holy_city_title;The Holy City;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_holy_city_desc;Mecca is the center of all Islam. To hold it is to stand above all others
column2: and prove to them that the fate of all Islam lies in our hands.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: hedjaz_independent_title;Declare Independence from Egypt;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
hedjaz_independent_desc;It is clear that Egypt is no longer in a position to rule us. Thus it is time for the Hedjaz to find its own path.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
education_decree_1863_title;Filipino Education Decree;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
education_decree_1863_desc;Through the Education Decree of 1863
column2: Queen Isabella II decreed the establishment of a free public shool system in the Philippines that used Spanish as the language of instruction
column3: leading to an increasing number of educated Filipinos. This would be the first in a number of colonial initiatives that rendered the Philippines as one of the few places in the world where it was said to have visibly improved and prospered under colonial rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_1898_title;Treaty of Paris;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_paris_1898_desc;Spain has no choice but to admit it cannot hold onto its Caribbean and Pacific holdings. If we sit down and enter into peace negotiations with the Spanish government
column2: it is possible they might be willing to end this war and turn over their holdings to us?for a price. Some will see this as the beginnings of American colonialism
column3: but to our government this is simply a recognition of the world power that the United States has become.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_1898_victory_title;Treaty of Paris;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_paris_1898_victory_desc;We have been victorious in our war against Spain
column2: and Cuba is now free. The Spanish government should realize it does not have the power to hold onto its North American and Pacific colonies. We should approach them and demand they turn over these colonies to us-- for
column3: while it might indicate to some the beginnings of American colonialism
column4: we feel these colonies are best entrusted to the care of a democratic Western power who has the power to hold them.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: moret_law_title;The Moret Law;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
moret_law_desc;The Moret Law granted freedom to slaves in Puerto Rico born after 1868
column2: slaves who served in the Spanish Army
column3: slaves over 60 years old
column4: and slaves who were owned by the Spanish government. It was the first in a series of reforms that saw slavery ended in Peurto Rico
column5: well before it was ended in other Spanish colonies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_indonesia_title;Unite Indonesia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_indonesia_desc;We must unite all of the Malay
column2: Javan
column3: Moluccan and Melanesian people of the East Indies under a common banner. Down with the imperialists!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sarawak_protectorate_title;Establish Protectorate Over Sarawak;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
sarawak_protectorate_desc;The so-called 'White Rajah' dynasty of Sarawak has held close ties with England since its creation
column2: and now the possibility of peacefully establishing a protectorate over this kingdom in the East Indies has arisen.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sulu_protectorate_title;Establish Protectorate Over Sulu;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
sulu_protectorate_desc;The Sultanate of Sulu has held close ties with Spain for many years
column2: and now the possibility of peacefully establishing a protectorate over this country in the East Indies has arisen.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_lan_na_title;Annex Lan Na;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
annex_lan_na_desc;The Kingdom of Lan Na must unite with Siam
column2: for the benefit of both our nations in resisting imperialist control.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: flores_sale_title;Sell Flores to the Dutch;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
flores_sale_desc;The Indonesian islands are almost worthless to us
column2: but might be of value to the Dutch East India Company. We should consider selling them for a tidy profit.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: end_of_the_UK_title;The end of the United Kingdom;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_the_UK_desc;With both Scotland and Ireland gone
column2: this Kingdom can't be called 'United' anymore. Long live England!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_mayan_lands_title;마야 제국 재건;Rebuild the Mayan Empire;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_mayan_lands_desc;마야인들이 잃어버렸던 것들을 되찾을 때가 왔습니다!;The time has come for the Mayan people to reclaim what they have lost!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_santa_catarina_title;Claim Santa Catarina;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_santa_catarina_desc;Our fellow rebels in the neighboring province of Santa Catarina must be liberated. The Juliana Republic must be freed from Brazilian rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_albania_title;Claim Greater Albania;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_albania_desc;The lands of ethnic Albanians must be reunited with the motherland
column2: no matter where they might live.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_mongolia_title;Claim Greater Mongolia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_mongolia_desc;The lands of ethnic Mongolians must be reunited with the motherland
column2: no matter where they might live.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_tatar_lands_title;Claim Tatar Lands;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_tatar_lands_desc;Now that the Tatars are strong once again
column2: we must reclaim the historical lands of Tartary!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: inherit_ryukyu_title;Inherit Ryukyu;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
inherit_ryukyu_desc;The islands of Ryukyu have always had blood ties to both China and Japan. They must be brought into the fold with the rest of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
ryukyu_is_japanese_title;Ryukyu Is Japanese;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
ryukyu_is_japanese_desc;The islands that were once Ryukyu are rightfully Japanese territory. We must establish our claim to them!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_afghanistan_title;Claim Greater Afghanistan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_afghanistan_desc;We are a power to be reckoned with. It is time that we claimed the lands that are part of our heritage!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_nepal_title;Claim Greater Nepal;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_nepal_desc;The time has come to revoke the Sugauli Treaty and take back that which was taken from us. Greater Nepal must be restored!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_serbia_title;Claim Greater Serbia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_serbia_desc;Many Serbs live throughout the Balkans. It is our duty to unite all of them under the Serbian flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_croatia_title;Reclaim Croatia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_croatia_desc;The Croatians renounced their ties to Hungary during the revolution
column2: but now the time has come to reclaim our ancient kingdom's western shores.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_ukraine_title;Claim the Greater Ukraine;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_ukraine_desc;All Ukrainians must rightfully fall under the Ukrainian flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_macedonia_title;Claim Greater Macedonia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_macedonia_desc;All Macedonians must rightfully fall under the Macedonian flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_ukraine_title;Unite with the Ukraine;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_ukraine_desc;For the common good of our people
column2: we must set aside our sovereignty and join the greater Ukrainian nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_poland_title;Jeszcze Polska nie Zginela;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_poland_desc;Poland must be reborn! With Warsaw back in our hands
column2: we must take the first step towards uniting all Polish people under a common flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_poland_title;Unite with Poland;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_poland_desc;Now that Poland has been reborn
column2: the time has come for Krakow to rejoin the motherland.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: galicia_annex_krakow_title;Unite with Galicia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
krakow_form_galicia_title;Form Galicia-Lodomeria;;;;;;;;;;;;x
krakow_form_galicia_desc;Now that we have liberated Galicia from foreign tyranny
column2: let us extend to its people the freedoms we ourselves hold dear. Long live free Galicia!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: pbc_in_chaos_title;Chaos in the Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
pbc_in_chaos_desc;Now the Confederation is desestabilized
column2: we should break free from the southern dominance and show who is the real power in the Andes!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_new_pbc_title;The new Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_new_pbc_desc;Now we are a greater power
column2: we can unite again with our South-Andean brothers and sisters.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_confederation_PEU_title;The end of Peru-Bolivian Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_confederation_PEU_desc;As Peru is not connected to Bolivia anymore
column2: the Confederacy can be declared extinct.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_confederation_SPU_title;The end of Peru-Bolivian Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_confederation_SPU_desc;As South Peru is not connected to Bolivia anymore
column2: the Confederacy can be declared extinct.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_confederation_BOL_title;The end of Peru-Bolivian Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_confederation_BOL_desc;As Bolivia is not connected to Peru anymore
column2: the Confederacy can be declared extinct.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_la_paz_title;Treaty of La Paz;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_la_paz_desc;Our claim to both Peru and Bolivia is now considered legitimate.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
centralizer_act_huayna_capac_title;Acto Centralizador 'Huayna Capac';;;;;;;;;;;;;x
centralizer_act_huayna_capac_desc;As the central government grows stronger
column2: the Confederation becomes more and more an unitary state. The 'Centralizer Act Huayna Capac' concentrates even more power in the president and creates the United Republic of Peru-Bolivia.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_new_pbc_title;The new Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_new_pbc_desc;Now we are a greater power
column2: we can unite again with our South-Andean brothers and sisters.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reunite_peru_title;Reunite Peru;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reunite_peru_desc;With the Confederation finally broken
column2: we stand in a position to resume control over South Peru and unite the nation once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_angola_title;Organize the Angolan Colony;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_angola_desc;Angola is becoming a true Portuguese colony. We must create the proper colonial structures
column2: so that it stands on par with our European provinces.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_mozambique_title;Organize the Mozambican Colony;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_mozambique_desc;Mozambique is becoming a true Portuguese colony. We must create the proper colonial structures
column2: so that it stands on par with our European provinces.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_simulambuko_desc;With the colonial powers of Europe having met at the Congo Conference to decide the orderly division of the African continent
column2: pressure is mounting for Portugal to occupy the lands we have lain claim to. Our diplomats have been in close contact with the princes of Cabinda
column3: and with additional urging we should be able to conclude a treaty forcing the Kongolese to surrender our Angolan claims.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_simulambuko_title;Treaty of Simulambuko;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_uzbekistan_khiva_title;Become Uzbekistan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_uzbekistan_khiva_desc;We must unite the Uzbeks into a single state
column2: with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Uzbek leadership
column3: all of Turkestan will one day be united!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_uzbekistan_bukkhara_title;Become Uzbekistan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_uzbekistan_bukkhara_desc;We must unite the Uzbeks into a single state
column2: with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Uzbek leadership
column3: all of Turkestan will one day be united!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_kyrgyzstan_title;Become Kyrgyzstan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_kyrgyzstan_desc;We must unite the Kyrgyz into a single and modern state
column2: with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Kyrgyz leadership
column3: all of Turkestan will one day be united!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_turkestan_title;Unite Turkestan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_turkestan_desc;Under our nation's leadership
column2: the Turkmen
column3: Kyrgyz
column4: Tajiks and Uzbeks can at last be united into a single Turkestan. Should this dream ever come to pass
column5: the world shall tremble before our might!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_yugoslavia_title;Form Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_yugoslavia_desc;The Slavic peoples of the Balkans must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_serbia_title;The End of Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_serbia_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_croatia_title;The End of Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_croatia_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_slovenia_title;The End of Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_slovenia_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_bosnia_title;The End of Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_bosnia_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_albania_title;The End of Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_albania_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_montenegro_title;The End of Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_montenegro_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_czechoslovakia_title;Form Czechoslovakia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_czechoslovakia_desc;Bohemia and Slovakia cannot exist alone amidst the warring powers of Europe. We must unite under a single banner!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_czechoslovakia_bohemia_title;The End of Czechoslovakia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_czechoslovakia_bohemia_desc;The union of Bohemia and Slovakia has been sundered. It is time to bring Czechoslovakia to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_czechoslovakia_slovakia_title;The End of Czechoslovakia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_czechoslovakia_slovakia_desc;The union of Bohemia and Slovakia has been sundered. It is time to bring Czechoslovakia to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_moldavia_wallachia_title;Unite Wallachia & Moldavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_moldavia_wallachia_desc;The Principalities of Moldavia and Wallachia must unite under a single flag
column2: and together achieve our destiny as a united Romania!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_romania_title;Unite with Romania;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_romania_desc;Now that Romania has been formed
column2: the time has come for us to join the motherland.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_romania_title;Create Romania;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_romania_desc;A united and free Romania will make a formidable and valuable ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
provincia_cisplatina_title;Provincia Cisplatina;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
provincia_cisplatina_desc;The Provincia Cisplatina was brazilian once
column2: and shall be brazilian again!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: rio_da_prata_title;Natural Borders;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
rio_da_prata_desc;As the Parana river is the natural southern border of Brazil
column2: it's natural for such a great country to conquer Entre-Rios.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: banda_oriental_title;Banda Oriental;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
banda_oriental_desc;The Banda Oriental del Uruguay was argentinean once
column2: and shall be argentinean again!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: our_brothers_the_gauchos_title;Our Brothers
column2: the Gauchos;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: our_brothers_the_gauchos_desc;It's time to free our brothers
column2: the Gauchos
column3: from the brazilian rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: gran_colombia_by_sword_title;Claim Gran Colombia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
gran_colombia_by_sword_desc;If Gran Colombia is to exist once again
column2: we must lay claim to all its territory-- and reunite it by sword

column1: unite_gran_colombia_title;Reunite Gran Colombia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_gran_colombia_desc;Gran Colombia shall be reborn from the ashes. Long live the united republic!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_austria_title;Become Austria;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_austria_desc;The time has come to end the dual monarchy and return to our Austrian heritage.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_hungarian_revolution_title;End of the Hungarian Revolution;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_hungarian_revolution_desc;There is no hope for us to continue. Our revolutionaries stand defeated and our country occupied-- we must submit!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
release_galicia_title;Release Galicia-Lodomeria;;;;;;;;;;;;x
release_galicia_desc;With our holdings in Galicia-Lodomeria cut off from the rest of Austria
column2: it only makes sense that we give the locals more autonomy. Let the Polish raise their own armies-- so long as they do so in the service of the Austrian crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: release_bukovina_title;Release Bukovina;;;;;;;;;;;;x
release_bukovina_desc;With our holdings in Bukovina cut off from the rest of Austria
column2: it only makes sense that we give the locals more autonomy. Let the Romanians raise their own armies-- so long as they do so in the service of the Austrian crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bosnian_annexation_title;Annex Bosnia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
bosnian_annexation_desc;The government feels it is vital to bring Bosnia more fully under our administration
column2: despite the international furore it might cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_neutral_faction_title;Abandon Neutrality;;;;;;;;;;;;x
abandon_neutral_faction_desc;We can no longer afford to stand on the sidelines in the civil war. For better or worse
column2: we must recognize that we have already cast the die in the conflict and take a stand.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_kuomintang_faction_title;Abandon the Kuomintang;;;;;;;;;;;;x
abandon_kuomintang_faction_desc;The goals of the Kuomintang are no longer our own. As our ideology has changed
column2: so must our allegiance. The civil war continues!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_communist_faction_title;Abandon the Communists;;;;;;;;;;;;x
abandon_communist_faction_desc;The goals of the Communists are no longer our own. As our ideology has changed
column2: so must our allegiance. The civil war continues!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_beiyang_faction_title;Abandon the Beiyang;;;;;;;;;;;;x
abandon_beiyang_faction_desc;The goals of the Beiyang Army are no longer our own. As our ideology has changed
column2: so must our allegiance. The civil war continues!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_leader_of_kuomintang_title;Leader of the Kuomintang;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_leader_of_kuomintang_desc;It falls to us to take the mantle of Kuomintang leadership. Victory for Nationalist China!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_leader_of_beiyang_title;Leader of the Beiyang;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_leader_of_beiyang_desc;With control over Beijing
column2: we may assume leadership over the Beiyang government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_leader_of_communists_title;Leader of the Chinese Communists;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_leader_of_communists_desc;With control over Beijing
column2: we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_the_KMT_title;Join the Kuomintang;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_the_KMT_desc;Now that we control Beijing
column2: we are in a position to aid the cause of Nationalist China. We must join our forces with theirs
column3: for the good of all!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reunification_of_china_KMT_title;Reunification of Nationalist China;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reunification_of_china_KMT_desc;With control over the capital
column2: we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reunification_of_china_communist_title;Reunification of China;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reunification_of_china_communist_desc;With control over the capital
column2: we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reunification_of_china_title;Chinese Reunification;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reunification_of_china_desc;With control over the capital
column2: we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: beiyang_faction;Beiyang Faction;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kuomintang_faction;Kuomintang Faction;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
neutral_faction;Part of no Faction;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
communist_faction;Communist Faction;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unequal_treaty_title;The Unequal Treaty;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unequal_treaty_desc;The Qing Empire is at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table
column2: and wrangle concessions of both land and reparations-- provided they are willing

column1: unequal_treaty_TPG_title;The Unequal Treaty;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unequal_treaty_TPG_desc;The Heavenly Kingdom is at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table
column2: and wrangle concessions of both land and reparations-- provided they are willing

column1: total_war_in_taiping_desc;영광스러운 혁명이 기다리고 있습니다. 대의명분이 승리를 향한 첫 걸음을 내딛기 전에 죽지 않도록 신민들에게 싸울 것을 촉구해야 합니다.;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: total_war_in_taiping_title;태평천국의 총력전;Total War in Taiping;;;;;;;;;;;;x
total_war_in_peking_desc;태평천국은 왕조와 제국 전체를 위협합니다. 신민들에게 야소(예수)를 믿는 이교도들과 맞서 싸울 것을 촉구해야 합니다!;The Taiping Rebellion threatens the dynasty and
column2: indeed
column3: the entire Empire. We must call on all our citizens to rise up and fight against these Christian infidels!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_peking_title;베이징의 총력전;Total War in Peking;;;;;;;;;;;;x
total_war_in_kashgaria_desc;영광스러운 혁명이 기다리고 있습니다. 대의명분이 승리를 향한 첫 걸음을 내딛기 전에 죽지 않도록 신민들에게 싸울 것을 촉구해야 합니다.;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: total_war_in_kashgaria_title;카슈가르의 총력전;Total War in Kashgaria;;;;;;;;;;;;x
total_war_in_yunnan_desc;영광스러운 혁명이 기다리고 있습니다. 대의명분이 승리를 향한 첫 걸음을 내딛기 전에 죽지 않도록 신민들에게 싸울 것을 촉구해야 합니다.;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: total_war_in_yunnan_title;운남의 총력전;Total War in Yunnan;;;;;;;;;;;;x
total_war_in_rio_grande_sul_desc;영광스러운 혁명이 기다리고 있습니다. 대의명분이 승리를 향한 첫 걸음을 내딛기 전에 죽지 않도록 신민들에게 싸울 것을 촉구해야 합니다.;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: total_war_in_rio_grande_sul_title;히우그란지두술의 총력전;Total War in Rio Grande do Sul;;;;;;;;;;;;x
total_war_in_rio_grande_title;리오그란데의 총력전;Total War in Rio Grande;;;;;;;;;;;;x
total_war_in_rio_grande_desc;영광스러운 혁명이 기다리고 있습니다. 대의명분이 승리를 향한 첫 걸음을 내딛기 전에 죽지 않도록 신민들에게 싸울 것을 촉구해야 합니다.;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: total_war_in_yucatan_desc;영광스러운 혁명이 기다리고 있습니다. 대의명분이 승리를 향한 첫 걸음을 내딛기 전에 죽지 않도록 신민들에게 싸울 것을 촉구해야 합니다.;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: total_war_in_yucatan_title;유카탄의 총력전;Total War in Yucatan;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_hindustan_title;힌두스탄 결성;Form Hindustan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

form_india_desc;인도 아대륙의 모든 인민들은 우리의 깃발 아래 단결해 제국주의 세력의 인도 침략에 항거해야 합니다.;The peoples of the Indian sub-continent must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_marathas_title;마라타 결성;Form Marathas;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

form_marathas_desc;마라타 제국은 한때 인도 아대륙에서 가장 큰 세력이었습니다. 다시 한 번 상승할 때가 왔습니다!;The Maratha Empire was once the greatest force upon the Indian subcontinent. The time has come for it to rise once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_dravidistan_title;드라비다스탄 결성;Form Dravidistan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_dravidistan_desc;드라비다인들은 우리의 깃발 아래 단결해 제국주의 세력의 인도 침략에 항거해야 합니다.;We must unite the Dravidian people under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_rajputana_title;라지푸타나 결성;Form Rajputana;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_rajputana_desc;라지푸타나인들은 우리의 깃발 아래 단결해 제국주의 세력의 인도 침략에 항거해야 합니다.;We must unite the Rajput people under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_rajputana_outside_title;라지 결성;Form the Raj;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_rajputana_outside_desc;The Rajput states must be collected into a single state
column2: one which will far better serve our needs as a stronger ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_rajputana_outside_desc;라지푸타나인들은 한 국가로 모여야 합니다. 그렇게만 된다면 더욱 강력한 동맹국으로서 우리의 기대에 훨씬 더 잘 부응할 것입니다.;The Rajput states must be collected into a single state
column2: one which will far better serve our needs as a stronger ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_baluchistan_desc;The Baluchi people must be liberated and united under a single flag-- ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_durrani_empire_title;Revive the Durrani Empire;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_durrani_empire_desc;With Pashtun lands once again back in our hands
column2: the empire of the Pashtuns can once again rise and reclaim that which was lost!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_bengal_title;Claim Greater Bengal;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_bengal_desc;The Bengal Empire once ruled over much of eastern India
column2: and the time has come to once again restake our claim. We must strike a blow against the forces of imperialism!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: PNJ_embrace_pashtun_minority_title;Embrace the Pashtuns;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
PNJ_embrace_pashtun_minority_desc;The Sikh Empire is a secular
column2: tolerant state. We shall embrace the Pashtun lands under our dominion
column3: and together forge a nation even stronger than before.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: PNJ_embrace_sindi_minority_title;Embrace the Sindi;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
PNJ_embrace_sindi_minority_desc;The Sikh Empire is a secular
column2: tolerant state. We shall embrace the Sindi lands under our dominion
column3: and together forge a nation even stronger than before.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: PNJ_embrace_avadhi_minority_title;Embrace the Avadhi;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
PNJ_embrace_avadhi_minority_desc;The Sikh Empire is a secular
column2: tolerant state. We shall embrace the Avadhi lands under our dominion
column3: and together forge a nation even stronger than before.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: rangit_singh_title;Rule of the Maharajah;;;;;;;;;;;;x
rangit_singh_desc;The Maharajah Ranjit Singh has united the Panjabi misls under a single flag. He has formed a secular and tolerant state
column2: one that has thrown off the Afghan yoke and resisted the encroaching imperialists. The future of the Sikh Empire is bright!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_nepal_title;Unite with Nepal;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_nepal_desc;The time has come to rejoin with Greater Nepal and reform the great eastern kingdom.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
france_protector_of_eastern_christians_title;Claim Authority in the Holy Land;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
france_protector_of_eastern_christians_desc;Up until now
column2: the Russians have maintained sovereign authority over Christians in the Holy Land-- authority that rightfully belongs to the Roman Catholic Church. It is time for that to change.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_1856_title;Treaty of Paris;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_paris_1856_desc;With the Russians having failed to assert their authority over the Turks
column2: it is time for the powers of Europe to convene in Paris and settle the matter as best we can.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_russia_title;Treaty of Paris;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_paris_russia_desc;Now that we have successfully asserted our authority over the Turks
column2: it is time to convene the powers of Europe in Paris and settle the matter as best we can.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: protect_eastern_christians_desc;If we are to retain our status as the defenders of eastern Christians
column2: we must act now and make war upon the Turks and her allies. We will not be denied!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conquest_of_the_desert_title;Conquest of the Desert;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

conquest_of_the_desert_desc;A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern Patagonian lands and pacify them once and for all. Argentina must make its claim so none can deny us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
occupation_of_araucania_title;Occupation of Araucania;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

occupation_of_araucania_desc;A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern lands of Araucania and pacify them once and for all. Chile must make its claim so none can deny us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
argentina_chile_border_treaty_title;Argentina-Chile Border Treaty;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
argentina_chile_border_treaty_desc;Now that the lands of Araucania and Patagonia are fully settled
column2: it might be prudent for us to approach the Chileans and see if we cannot agree on a border-- they would get the lands west of the Andes and we the lands to the east. If we cannot come to an agreement
column3: there is likely to be war.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: entre_rios_independent_title;A Call to Rebellion;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
entre_rios_independent_desc;General Francisco Ram?ez has issued a call to the people of Argentina: rise up
column2: and force the dictators to agree to a just constitution that provides rights to every Argentine citizen!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_china_title;Become China;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_china_desc;With the northern capital now under our control
column2: the time has come to unite all of China under a single flag.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_holstein_title;Become Holstein;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_holstein_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Holstein is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_schleswig_title;Become Schleswig;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_schleswig_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Schleswig is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: appeal_to_the_british_title;Appeal to the British;;;;;;;;;;;;x
appeal_to_the_british_desc;Though we are loathe to do so
column2: it appears we are left with little choice: we must appeal to the British for protection
column3: lest we fall under foreign rule and lose what little we have left.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_xhosa_lands_title;Claim Xhosa Lands;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_xhosa_lands_desc;The Xhosa lands rightfully belong to the Cape Colony
column2: and the colonial governor has made a formal request to the British government to adminster the lands to protect colonist safety along the border.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: begin_crimean_war_title;We Must Act;;;;;;;;;;;;x
begin_crimean_war_desc;The Ottoman breach of our treaty protecting eastern Christians in the Levant cannot be abided. We must act
column2: or face the loss of both prestige and the confidence of Orthodox Russians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_poland_lithuania_title;The Commonwealth Reborn;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_poland_lithuania_desc;Our ancient empire has been reborn. Let Poland-Lithuania exist once again
column2: and let our ancient enemies tremble!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: stop_poland_lithuania_title;End the Commonwealth;;;;;;;;;;;;x
stop_poland_lithuania_desc;The Poland-Lithuanian union is at an end. We must put aside our dreams of greatness and return to our roots as Poland itself.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_baltic_states_title;Form the Baltic Union;;;;;;;;;;;;x

form_baltic_states_desc;The baltic cultures must unite into a single nation if we are to resist the aggression of Russians and other great powers. A single people under a single flag! Now and forever!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_baltic_states_title;Form the Baltic Union;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_baltic_states_desc;The former Grand Duchy of Livonia
column2: a union of the northern baltic cultures
column3: would make for a stronger ally than either Latvia or Estonia would alone. Let us create a puppet United Baltic Provinces nation that will serve us now and forever.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: commodore_perry_expedition_title;Commodore Perry's Expedition;;;;;;;;;;;;x
commodore_perry_expedition_desc;The Far East remains an enigma
column2: and one which is beyond the reach of most western powers due to the enforced seclusion of China and Japan. While China is largely spoken for
column3: Japan remains a potential target for American influence to expand. If we are to be taken seriously as a world power
column4: we must consider sending a force to negotiate for trade rights with the Japanese-- under the threat of military force
column5: if necessary.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kanagawa_treaty_title;The Treaty of Kanagawa;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kanagawa_treaty_desc;With enough pressure placed on the Japanese
column2: they will be forced to the negotiating table. A treaty can be hammered out at Kanagawa which will see Japan opened to outside trade and influence
column3: and our superiority proven beyond the shadow of a doubt.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unequal_treaty_desc;The Japanese are at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table
column2: and wrangle concessions of both trading privileges and reparations-- provided they are willing

column1: ansei_purge_title;The Ansei Purge;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
ansei_purge_desc;After the recent succession crisis of the shogunate
column2: there are too many opposing factions within the bakufu. We must take steps to ensure these men are retired
column3: forcefully or otherwise
column4: lest they continue to stir up problems in the name of the Emperor.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: overthrow_the_bakufu_title;Overthrow the Bakufu;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
overthrow_the_bakufu_desc;The time has come to restore Emperor Meiji to power. For too long has the imperial court been forced to remain but a figurehead
column2: with central authority remaining with the tyrannical Tokugawa clan. Japan must have one ruler
column3: an Emperor that can lead the nation into the future. Let us send our forces to Kyoto
column4: to seize the imperial palace and set the coup in motion.\n\n[SUB_A7]RNOTE: To win this war
column5: you must occupy Edo or White Peace with the Shogun. You must not allow Kyoto and your capital to become occupied.[SUB_A7]W;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: fukoku_kyohei_title;Fukoku Kyohei;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
fukoku_kyohei_desc;Meaning 'Enrich the country
column2: strengthen the military'
column3: this must become the objective of a unified Japan if we are to catch up with the technological advantage held by the West. We must face these barbarians at their own game
column4: and be better at it.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abolish_the_han_system_title;Abolish the Han System;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
abolish_the_han_system_desc;The han system
column2: under which the daimyo rule as feudal lords with very little central authority remaining to the government
column3: is an antiquated relic that must be eliminated. The domains shall be replaced with prefectures
column4: and the daimyos given roles as governors and bureaucrats. There will be resistance
column5: but all will come to understand that this is for the greater good of Japan.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_japan_title;Bunmei Kaika;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_japan_desc;With the embracing of Western ideas and authority slowly falling away from the shogunate
column2: the government will naturally pass first to the imperial court-- and eventually
column3: with the extension of voting privileges to the landowners
column4: to the Japanese people themselves. This is a natural process
column5: and one the Tokugawa must embrace for the good of Japan.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bonin_administration_title;Japanese Bonin;;;;;;;;;;;;x
bonin_administration_desc;Japan now controls the archipelago
column2: and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change them accordingly.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: taiwan_administration_title;Japanese Formosa;;;;;;;;;;;;x
taiwan_administration_desc;Japan now controls Formosa
column2: and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change the island accordingly.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: boer_republic_title;The Boer Republic;;;;;;;;;;;;x
boer_republic_desc;We have established a new nation
column2: dominated by the Voortrekkers and carved from the territory of African natives. This is a new opportunity for us to live outside of British rule
column3: now and forever.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sand_river_convention_desc;The Boers of the Transvaal are becoming increasingly resistant to colonial rule. The time has come to meet with them at Pretoria and discuss the terms of their independence-- preferably subject to our conditions
column2: which are that they abandon all laws allowing slavery and that our influence within their borders remain strong.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: orange_river_convention_desc;The Boers of the Orange Free State are becoming increasingly resistant to colonial rule. The time has come to meet with them at Bloemfontein and discuss the terms of their independence-- preferably subject to our conditions
column2: which are that they abandon all laws allowing slavery and that our influence within their borders remain strong.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_north_cape_colony_title;Claim the Northern Cape;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_north_cape_colony_desc;The northern cape colony rightfully belongs to us. We must take steps to assert our claim
column2: before our African ambitions come to naught.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_transvaal_title;Claim the Transvaal;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_transvaal_desc;The Transvaal is boer territory and rightfully belongs as part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_oranje_title;Claim Transorangia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_oranje_desc;The territory of the Orange Free State is Boer land and rightfully belongs as part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_natalia_title;Claim Natal;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_natalia_desc;The Natal is boer territory and rightfully belongs as part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_south_africa_title;Form South Africa;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_south_africa_desc;With the Cape Colony under our control we can form a true
column2: united Boer republic-- one that at last will keep us from foreign domination and British rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_vereeniging_title;Treaty of Vereeniging;;;;;;;;;;;;x

treaty_of_vereeniging_desc;The Cape Colony is under our control. Now is the time to sit down with our former colonial masters and work out a peace deal that will see it transferred back into Boer hands.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_umtata_title;Treaty of Umtata;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_umtata_desc;Now that the war with the Xhosa is done
column2: the time has come to discuss our mutual borders. With our colonists increasingly moving eastward
column3: we may need to incorporate some of their lands into the Cape Colony.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_hungarian_revolution_title;End of the Hungarian Revolution;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_hungarian_revolution_desc;There is no hope for us to continue. Our revolutionaries stand defeated and our country occupied-- we must submit!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
second_alaskan_purchase_title;The Northern Alaska Purchase;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
second_alaskan_purchase_desc;Interlopers have moved in on our claims in northern Alaska. Considering we have friendly enough relations with them
column2: perhaps we should consider a purchase of the territory before we resort to war?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: hawaiian_purchase_title;The Hawaiian Islands Purchase;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
hawaiian_purchase_desc;Interlopers have moved in on our claims in the Hawaiian Islands region. Considering we have friendly enough relations with them
column2: perhaps we should consider a purchase of the territory before we resort to war?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_hawaii_title;Annex Hawaii;;;;;;;;;;;;x
annex_hawaii_desc;Our relationship with the Hawaiian government has borne fruit. They have asked to become a part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
sell_alaska_title;Seek a Buyer for Alaska;;;;;;;;;;;;x
sell_alaska_desc;We have little use for our North American holdings. They are difficult to defend
column2: and would be worth far more to another country than it is to us. While it may take some time to find an interested and appropriate buyer
column3: perhaps we should start the process?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: rio_grande_treaty_title;Treaty of the Rio Grande;;;;;;;;;;;;x
rio_grande_treaty_desc;Our allies in the Rio Grande should be approached to find their willingness to turn over lands claimed by the state of Texas.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
apply_for_USA_statehood2_title;연방 가입신청;Apply for Statehood;Demande de rattachement en tant qu'[SUB_A7]Wat;Antrag auf Souver[SUB_A7]Wit[SUB_A7]W;;Solicitud de ingreso como estado;;;;;;;;;x
apply_for_USA_statehood2_desc;아메리카 대륙에서의 우리의 위치
column2: 전통 문화와 미국의 그것을 생각한다면
column3: 미국은 우리의 연방 가입을 허락할 것입니다. 연방 가입신청이 허가된다면 우리나라는 미국의 일부가 됩니다.;Our position on the North American continent
column4: and our traditional cultural ties to the USA
column5: make it likely that the USA would accept a petition of statehood from us. Doing this means our country will be annexed by the United States;Notre position g[SUB_A7]Wgraphique sur le continent nord Am[SUB_A7]Wicain
column6: et les liens qui nous unissent aux Etats-Unis font que ces derniers accepteraient probablement une p[SUB_A7]Wition sur une demande de rattachement en tant qu'Etat. En faisant cela
column7: notre pays serait annex[SUB_A7]Waux Etats-Unis.;Unsere Position auf dem nordamerikanischen Kontinent und unsere traditionellen kulturellen Verbindungen mit den USA machen es wahrscheinlich
column8: dass die USA einen Antrag auf Souver[SUB_A7]Wit[SUB_A7]W von uns akzeptiert. Dies bedeutet
column9: dass unser Land von den Vereinigten Staaten annektiert wird;;Por nuestra posici[SUB_A7]W en el continente norteamericano y nuestros v[SUB_A7]Wculos culturales tradicionales con los EE.;UU. parece probable que nos acepten como estado de la Uni[SUB_A7]W si lo solicitamos. Si lo hacemos
column10: nuestro pa[SUB_A7]W ser[SUB_A7]Wanexionado por los Estados Unidos.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: canadian_dominion_title;The Canadian Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;x
canadian_dominion_desc;The Confederation of Canada now has self-rule. Our dominion is ours to govern
column2: as a new and emerging power not only within North America but in the world.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vive_le_quebec_title;Vive le Quebec Libre!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vive_le_quebec_desc;Quebec is free! Finally the Quebecois has the right to govern themselves
column2: and seek out their destiny as an emerging power not only in North America but in the world!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_british_columbia_title;Organize British Columbia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_british_columbia_desc;The colonies of Columbia
column2: New Caledonia and Vancouver Island must be merged into a single entity -- both for the sake of their viability as well as to ensure their strength in the years to come.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_confederation_title;Join Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_confederation_desc;Our position on the North American continent
column2: and our traditional cultural ties to Canada
column3: make it likely that Canada would be willing to negotiate our entrance into confederation. Doing this means our country will be annexed by Canada.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_the_rcmp_title;Form the R.C.M.P.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

form_the_rcmp_desc;With the acquisition of Rupert's Land and the North-West Territories it has become increasingly obvious that a new force is required to patrol those lands and keep order.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
build_the_cnr_title;Build the Canadian National Railway;;;;;;;;;;;;x
build_the_cnr_desc;One railway
column2: linking the Pacific and Atlantic coasts
column3: is a dream that will ensure the unity of Canada -- though it is an expensive dream
column4: to be sure.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_heligoland_title;The Heligoland Treaty;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_heligoland_desc;Germany is eager to obtain the island of Heligoland
column2: currently in our possession. To avoid a war
column3: it might be in our best interest to arrange a trade: Heligoland in exchange for one of their colonies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_kashmir_title;Create the Kashmir Dominion;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_kashmir_desc;For the good of the Empire
column2: we should create a new Princely State in the northern dominion of Kashmir.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: gold_coast_treaty_title;Gold Coast Treaty;;;;;;;;;;;;x
gold_coast_treaty_desc;We have experienced numerous conflicts with the Dutch government
column2: in regards to their colonial holdings on the Gold Coast and elsewhere. A treaty to solidify our hold on the Gold Coast
column3: and increase our mutual friendship and cooperation
column4: might be beneficial to both our nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recognize_the_csa_title;Officially recognize the CSA;;;;;;;;;;;;x
recognize_the_csa_desc;We will extend formal recognition of the Confederate States of America
column2: opening an embassy in their capital and formally establishing relations. The Yankees will
column3: of course
column4: not approve.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: right_to_secede_title;The Right to Secede;;;;;;;;;;;;x
right_to_secede_desc;The Civil War is over
column2: and despite our wishes the United States stands divided. Our only option is to extend official recognition of the south's right to secede. If we cannot live under the same roof
column3: we shall be kind neighbors
column4: and perhaps even brothers in arms. May God help us all.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: second_declaration_of_independence_title;The Second Declaration of Independence;;;;;;;;;;;;x
second_declaration_of_independence_desc;As the founding fathers did before us
column2: so shall we stand up for our sovereign rights and not permit the interests of the North override what the South knows to be right and proper in our eyes. We shall be free
column3: and let no free man say otherwise.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: establish_panslavism_title;Establish Pan-Slavism;;;;;;;;;;;;x

establish_panslavism_desc;The Orthodox Christians of the Balkans have lived under the boot of Muslim oppression for too long. The time has come to call on them to rise up against their oppressors. All Yugoslavia must unite!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_bukhara_title;The Great Game Comes to Bukhara;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_bukhara_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that Bukhara must join our nation
column2: or stand forever more subject to British aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_kokand_title;The Great Game Comes to Kokand;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_kokand_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that Kokand must join our nation
column2: or stand forever more subject to British aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_khiva_title;The Great Game Comes to Khiva;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_khiva_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that Khiva must join our nation
column2: or stand forever more subject to British aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: meddled_in_foreign_affairs;Meddled in Foreign Affairs;;;;;;;;;;;;x
force_vassal_freedom_title;We Shall Be Free;;;;;;;;;;;;x
force_vassal_freedom_desc;A chance is upon us. Do we approach the great power who has so much influence in $COUNTRY$
column2: and ask them to intervene in our affairs? If we do
column3: we stand a chance of freeing ourselves from foreign rule. We also stand to lose a great deal
column4: as do they. We must proceed cautiously.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: no_freedom;Attempted Freedom;;;;;;;;;;;;x
no_freedom_desc;We attempted to free ourselves from foreign rule. We must wait until there is another opportunity
column2: as for now they are watching us closely.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: NOT_STRONGER_ARMY_THAN;Does not have a stronger military than ;;;;;;;;;;;;x
STRONGER_ARMY_THAN;Has a stronger military than ;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_cambodian_protectorate_title;Create Cambodian Protectorate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_cambodian_protectorate_desc;Fearing invasion by the Siamese
column2: the Cambodians have requested that we allow them to join the Dai Viet in protection by our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: accademia_della_crusca_title;Accademia della Crusca;;;;;;;;;;;;x
accademia_della_crusca_desc;The Accademy of the Crusca
column2: the most prertigious center of study for the italian language
column3: would gladly appreciate an economic help from your majesty to keep on with the good work on italian literature's history... and to pay those new paintings for the main hall;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: plombieres_title;Accordo di Plombi?es;;;;;;;;;;;;x
plombieres_desc;We should seek french help to kick Austria out of Italy.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
garibaldi_redshirts_title;Expedition of the Thousand;;;;;;;;;;;;x
garibaldi_redshirts_desc;The revolutionary leader
column2: Giuseppe Garibaldi
column3: has called upon the Italian people to take arms in the name of unification. A volunteer army under Garibaldi's leadership will topple the southern governments and remove the stain of the Bourbon legacy from the peninsula forever.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: war_italian_independence_title;War of Italian Independence;;;;;;;;;;;;x
war_italian_independence_desc;It falls upon our nation to break the power that Austria has over Italy. Lombardia must be freed
column2: at any cost.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: italian_call_to_union;Italian Call to Union;;;;;;;;;;;;x
italian_call_to_union_title;Italian Call to Union;;;;;;;;;;;;x
italian_call_to_union_desc;The time has come to call upon the Italian people to rise up and unite under a common banner. Risorgimento must commence!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we_are_italian_title;We are Italian!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we_are_italian_desc;Now that we are free
column2: it is time to reassert our Italian heritage. We must rejoin the motherland!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_tuscany_title;Unite with Tuscany;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_tuscany_desc;For the good of Italian reunification
column2: the time has come for Lucca to unite with our Tuscan neighbours to the south.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: objects_to_italy;Objects to Italian Unification;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_ouchy_title;Treaty of Ouchy;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_ouchy_desc;Now that we possess Tripoli
column2: we can take the Turks to the negotiating table and force them to hand over the remainder of Libya in exchange for any other provinces of theirs we hold.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: perfect_fusion_title;Fusione Perfetta;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
perfect_fusion_desc;Now that liberal forms have been introduced to our nation's government
column2: the people of Sardinia have come to view their separate status as more of a liability than a privilege. Perhaps an act of 'Perfect Union' between the Sardinians and the northern Italians is required to at last bring harmony to our house and aid the eventual reuinification of Italy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_savoy_title;Become Savoy;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_savoy_desc;With the loss of Sardinia
column2: we can no longer claim a name that belongs to a union of Sardinia and Piedmont. We must become the Duchy of Savoy once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_piedmont_title;Become Sardinia-Piedmont;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_piedmont_desc;Sardinia and Piedmont must be united into a single land once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_baltic_states_title;Unite the Baltic States;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_baltic_states_desc;The time has become to unite the Baltic nations under a single flag-- ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_baltic_states_title;Create the Baltic States;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_baltic_states_desc;Uniting the Baltic nations under a single flag
column2: as a puppet to our nation
column3: will make for a much stronger ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_germany_AUS_title;Three Hurrahs For Germany!;Pour l'Allemagne
column2: hip hip hip
column3: hourra !;Ein dreifaches Hurra auf Deutschland!;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: form_germany_AUS_desc;The great empire of the Habsburgs no longer exists
column2: but the unification of Germany under Austrian leadership
column3: as perhaps it was always meant to be
column4: still awaits us. Long live the German Empire
column5: one people ruled from the great city of Vienna!;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: austria_annex_SGF_title;Inherit the South German Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
austria_annex_SGF_desc;With the great empire of the Habsburgs now lost to us
column2: perhaps it is time to look north towards the unification of Germany. First
column3: however
column4: we must bring the South German Confederation under our own leadership.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_india_title;Form India;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_india_desc;The peoples of the Indian sub-continent must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_north_german_confederation2_title;Call for German Unity;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_north_german_confederation2_desc;The conditions may be less than ideal
column2: but in order to maintain national security and strive towards North German hegemony
column3: we must approach our North German allies and create a confederation. Only with a united front
column4: under a single flag
column5: may we succeed!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_south_german_confederation2_title;Call for German Unity;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_south_german_confederation2_desc;The conditions may be less than ideal
column2: but in order to maintain national security and strive towards South German hegemony
column3: we must approach our South German allies and create a confederation. Only with a united front
column4: under a single flag
column5: may we succeed!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_PRU;Become Prussia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_PRU_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Prussia is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_ANH;Become Anhalt;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_ANH_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Anhalt is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_SGF_BAD;Become Baden;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_SGF_BAD_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Baden is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_SGF_BAV;Become Bavaria;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_SGF_BAV_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Bavaria is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_BRA;Become Brunswick;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_BRA_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Brunswick is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_BRE;Become Bremen;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_BRE_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Bremen is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_FRM;Become Frankfurt;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_FRM_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Frankfurt is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_HAM;Become Hamburg;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_HAM_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Hamburg is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_HAN;Become Hannover;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_HAN_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Hannover is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_HEK;Become Hesse-Kessel;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_HEK_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Hesse-Kessel is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_HES;Become Hesse-Darmstadt;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_HES_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Hesse-Darmstadt is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_OLD;Become Oldenburg;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_OLD_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Oldenburg is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_SAX;Become Saxony;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_SAX_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Saxony is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_WEI;Become Saxe-Weimar;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_WEI_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Saxe-Weimar is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_SGF_WUR;Become W?ttemburg;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_SGF_WUR_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than W?ttemburg is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_MEI;Become Saxe-Meiningen;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_MEI_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Saxe-Meiningen is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_COB;Become Saxe-Coburg-Gotha;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_COB_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Saxe-Coburg-Gotha is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_NAS;Become Nassau;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_NAS_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Nassau is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_MEC;Become Mecklenberg;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_MEC_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Mecklenberg is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_LUB;Become L?eck;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_LUB_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than L?eck is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_LIP;Become Lippe;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_LIP_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Lippe is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: portuguese_civil_code_title;Portuguese Civil Code;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
portuguese_civil_code_desc;The Portuguese Civil Code was unique for European civil codes
column2: in its characterization of laws in terms of the person and property; it was divided into four sections: the person
column3: the acquisition of goods
column4: goods
column5: and the defense of those goods or rights.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_tartu_title;Treaty of Tartu;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_tartu_desc;Now that we are free from Russian rule
column2: we should approach the Russian government and discuss the claims to Petsamo and southern Karelia before we end up in a territorial war we cannot hope to win.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_gothenburg_title;G?eborg
column2: a Scandinavian Capital;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_gothenburg_desc;G?eborg is the center of the Scandinavian nation and would be a perfect Capital for our great nation and further unite our people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reform_kalmar_title;Reform the Kalmar Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reform_kalmar_desc;Once all of Scandinavia was ruled by a single monarch
column2: our people united in purpose. With our nation on the rise in power and prestige
column3: it is time to resurrect the Kalmar Union once more. For now this is just an idea
column4: and one we must convince the other Scandinavian countries to accept. In time
column5: they will come to see the benefit inherent in our common bond.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: SCA_customs_union_title;The Scandinavian Customs Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
SCA_customs_union_desc;The first step in uniting the Scandinavian nations is to eliminate the restrictions on trade between us. Open the borders!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
SCA_political_union_title;The Scandinavian Political Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
SCA_political_union_desc;The next step towards uniting Scandinavia is reducing the differences in our governments. Why have multiple agencies when there can simply be one
column2: providing all our people with the services they need? We must surrender our individual sovereignty for common gain.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: usurp_kalmar_title;Take Leadership in the Kalmar Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
usurp_kalmar_desc;While the Kalmar Union was not reborn in our nation
column2: it seems that a united Scandinavia will never come to pass unless a stronger country stands up and takes over the leadership role.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kalmar_union;Kalmar Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kalmar_union_desc;We have agreed in principle to a closer bond with the other Scandinavian nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
leader_of_kalmar;Leader of the Kalmar Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
leader_of_kalmar_desc;We are the leader of the movement to unite the Scandinavian people under a single flag.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
customs_union;Customs Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
customs_union_desc;We are a member of a customs union
column2: designed to reduce the barriers in trade between the member nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_kalmar_union_title;Join the Kalmar Union;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_kalmar_union_desc;The time has come for our nation to take part in the growing Scandinavian union.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
spanish_restoration;The Restoration;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
spanish_restoration_title;The Restoration;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
spanish_restoration_desc;A period of relative peace and stability in Spain initiated by King Alfonso XII
column2: the aim being to create a new system of government with balance between the liberals and conservatives.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: league_of_three_emperors_title;The League of Three Emperors;;;;;;;;;;;;x
league_of_three_emperors_desc;After the defeat of Napoleon
column2: a Holy Alliance was once formed between Prussia
column3: Austria and Russia. Perhaps the time has come to resurrect that alliance
column4: a common front between our three monarchies to stand against the wave of revolution and change and Europe?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_arab_union_title;Form Arab Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_arab_union_desc;A nation must arise to lead the Arab peoples of the world into the future
column2: a greater power that would unite the Arab world from Morocco to the Mashriq.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: propose_danube_federation_title;Propose the Danubian Federation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
propose_danube_federation_desc;A new notion has arisen in our country-- one of extending the rights currently enjoyed by the Hungarians to the other Danubian cultures. We cannot
column2: after all
column3: expect that our nation will be able to peacefully continue on with two cultures dominating so many others. Provided the Hungarians will agree
column4: we could unite our cultures into a larger and more peaceful federation of the Danube.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_danube_federation_title;Become the Danube Federation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_danube_federation_desc;Now that the Hungarians and all the Danubian cultures have been consulted
column2: the time has come for the new government to be implemented. Long live the Danubian Federation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_danube_federation_title;End the Federation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_danube_federation_desc;The concept of the Danubian Federation is no longer valid. We no longer control the territories that were once part of our nation
column2: and thus the time has come to give up the fiction and become Austria once more in truth.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_iberia_title;Become Iberia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_iberia_desc;We have proven our mettle and united the Iberian peninsula under our rule. Now the time has come for a new Iberian federation to be born
column2: one that unites all of the peninsula's cultures under a single rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_iberia2_title;Become Iberia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_iberia2_desc;We have proven our mettle and united the Iberian peninsula under our rule. Now the time has come for a new Iberian federation to be born
column2: one that unites all of the peninsula's cultures under a single rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_iberia_spain_title;Become Spain;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_iberia_spain_desc;The Iberian union is no longer the truth. We must put aside the fiction and become Spain in truth.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_iberia_portugal_title;Become Portugal;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_iberia_portugal_desc;The Iberian union is no longer the truth. We must put aside the fiction and become Portugal in truth.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_greece_title;Unite With Greece;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_greece_desc;Our proper place lies with Greece. Long live the Hellenic destiny!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_caliphate_title;Form the Islamic Caliphate;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_caliphate_desc;The dream of a true muslim nation: unite the peoples of Islam under a single banner
column2: one which could make the nations of the world shake before its might and cast fear into the hearts of men so used to treating our brethren as lesser beings.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: apply_sharia_law_title;Apply Sharia Law;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

apply_sharia_law_desc;Ours is a nation based on fundamental religious rule. Thus it is incumbent that Sharia law be applied to its fullest extent-- in the interest of keeping peace and order.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
repeal_sharia_law_title;Repeal Sharia Law;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
repeal_sharia_law_desc;Ours may be an Islamic union
column2: but it is no longer a nation based on fundamental religious rule. We must repeal the strict Sharia laws which have held back our nation for so long.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_la_plata_title;Unite La Plata;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_la_plata_desc;The nations which were once part of the Viceroyalty of La Plata must be reunited under a single flag once again
column2: the platinean peoples bound together into a great nation
column3: a power to rule in the New World.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_maghreb_title;Unite the Maghreb;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_maghreb_desc;The Maghrebi cultures of western Africa must be united under a single flag
column2: an Arab nation mighty enough to shake the world order to its foundations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_transcaucasia_title;Unite Transcaucasia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_transcaucasia_desc;The nations of the southern Caucasus must unite together
column2: a new power sufficient to withstand the might of Russian colonialism.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_transcaucasia_title;Create Transcaucasia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_transcaucasia_desc;The nations of the southern Caucasus must be united together
column2: a vassal that will serve as a loyal and mighty ally to our country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_north_caucasus_title;Claim the Northern Caucasus;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_north_caucasus_desc;By rights
column2: the northern Caucasus region belongs as part of our country just as do its people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_yemen_title;Become Yemen;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_yemen_desc;Northern and Southern Yemen must be united under a single flag-- ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
hatt_i_humayun_title;Hatt-i H?ayun;;;;;;;;;;;;x
hatt_i_humayun_desc;The Hatt-i H?ayun
column2: or 'Imperial Reform Edict'
column3: will take the concept of Ottomanism-- the belief that equality among the Empire's religious groups will solve its social issues-- to the logical conclusion. Full rights will be granted to the Empire's minorities
column4: and laws passed to grant each millet the right to use  the religious law of its population. This will go a long way towards dealing with some of the nationalist strife the country has suffered
column5: and bring the Ottoman Empire into a new and multicultural age.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: republican_reforms;Republican Reforms;;;;;;;;;;;;x
republican_reforms_title;Republican Reforms;;;;;;;;;;;;x
republican_reforms_desc;Under a liberal and democratic government
column2: Turkey must be transformed into a modern and secular state!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
