column1: greater_turkey_title;Claim Greater Turkey;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_turkey_desc;We must strive to restore the Greater Turkish Empire
column2: one that stretches throughout the Middle East rather than in Europe.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: fsa_enact_anaconda_plan_title;The Anaconda Plan;Le plan Anaconda;Der Anaconda-Plan;;El plan Anaconda;;;;;;;;;x
fsa_enact_anaconda_plan_desc;Originally devised by General-in-chief Winfield Scott
column2: the Anaconda plan was a plan for subduing the Free Americans by means of a massive naval blockade
column3: and a military advance along the coast. By initiating blockades of FSA ports
column4: we can increase their war exhaustion by denying them essential goods.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: fsa_shermans_march_to_the_sea_title;Sherman's March To The Sea;La marche de Sherman vers la mer;Shermans Marsch zum Meer;;La marcha hacia el mar de Sherman;;;;;;;;;x
fsa_shermans_march_to_the_sea_desc;During the campaign he conducted in November and December of 1864
column2: Major General William Tecumseh Sherman applied the doctrines of Total War in what can best be described as a campaign of terror directed at the civilian population of the North. By operating deep inside Free American territory
column3: and by destroying much of the north's civilian infrastructure
column4: Sherman is often said to have broken the North's will to fight. Apply his methods
column5: and it might be the final nail in the FSA's coffin.;Durant la campagne qu'il mena en G?rgie de novembre ?d?embre 1864
column6: le Major-g??al William Tecumseh Sherman appliqua une doctrine de guerre totale
column7: que l'on pourrait plut? qualifier de campagne de terreur ayant pour cible la population civile du Sud. En agissant profond?ent au sein des territoires conf???
column8: et en d?ruisant la majorit?des infrastructures civiles de la G?rgie
column9: Sherman est souvent cit?pour avoir bris?la volont?de combattre du Sud. Appliquons sa m?hode
column10: et cela pourrait ?re le dernier clou du cercueil des Conf???.;W?rend des Feldzuges durch Georgia im November und Dezember 1864 wandte Generalmajor William Tecumseh Sherman die Doktrinen des Totalen Krieges mit nur als Terrorkampagne zu bezeichnenden Aktionen gegen die Zivilbev?kerung des S?ens an. Durch Operationen tief in konf?eriertem Gebiet und durch Zerst?ung eines Gro?eils der Infrastruktur von Georgia brach Sherman vielen Meinungen nach den Kampfeswillen des S?ens. Wenden Sie seine Methoden an - vielleicht werden sie der letzte Nagel im Sarg der Konf?eration sein.;;Durante la campa? llevada a cabo en Georgia entre noviembre y diciembre de 1864
column11: el general William Tecumseh Sherman aplic?las doctrinas de la guerra total en lo que podr? describirse perfectamente como una campa? de terror dirigida contra las poblaciones civiles del sur. Se cree que al operar en el interior de territorio confederado y destruir gran parte de la infraestructura civil del enemigo
column12: Sherman logr?quebrantar la voluntad de combatir del sur. La aplicaci? de estos m?odos podr? suponer el ?timo clavo en la tapa del ata? del enemigo.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: raise_the_flag_of_freedom_title;Raise the Flag of Freedom!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
raise_the_flag_of_freedom_desc;The time has come to take a stand
column2: to fight against the dominance of the south and in the name of free men everywhere!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: fsa_enact_radical_reconstruction_title;Radical Reconstruction;Reconstruction radicale;Radikaler Wiederaufbau;;Reconstrucci? radical;;;;;;;;;x
fsa_enact_radical_reconstruction_desc;We have won the war against the FSA
column2: and now the time has come to restore order in the north. Yankee nationalism must be suppressed
column3: and policies enacted to ensure that a resurgence of chaos never occurs again.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_the_union_title;Restore the Union;;;;;;;;;;;;x
restore_the_union_desc;Our manifest destiny is to reclaim the United States of America which once was
column2: and thus to re-create it in the name of the Founding Fathers and the true spirit of independence.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_washington_capital_title;Move the Capital to Washington;;;;;;;;;;;;x
restore_washington_capital_desc;The capital of the USA rightfully belongs in Washington
column2: D.C. Now that it is under our control
column3: we must make the symbolic gesture of restoring it as the center of the Union and proving the strength of America.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_richmond_capital_title;Move the Capital to Richmond;;;;;;;;;;;;x
restore_richmond_capital_desc;The capital of the FSA rightfully belongs in Richmond
column2: Virginia. Now that it is under our control
column3: we must make the symbolic gesture of restoring it as the center of the Confederacy and proving the strength of the South.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_philadelphia_title;Move the Capital to Philadelphia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_philadelphia_desc;Let us move the capital to Philadelphia
column2: a city under our control and a cultural and historical center of the North.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_boston_title;Move the Capital to Boston;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_boston_desc;Let us move the capital to Boston
column2: a city under our control and a cultural and historical center of the North.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_atlanta_title;Move the Capital to Atlanta;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_atlanta_desc;Let us move the capital to Atlanta
column2: a city under our control and a cultural and historical center of the South.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recognize_the_fsa_title;Officially recognize the FSA;;;;;;;;;;;;x
recognize_the_fsa_desc;We will extend formal recognition of the Free States of America
column2: opening an embassy in their capital and formally establishing relations. The USA will
column3: of course
column4: not approve.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: FSA_right_to_secede_title;The Right to Secede;;;;;;;;;;;;x
FSA_right_to_secede_desc;The Civil War is over
column2: and despite our wishes the United States stands divided. Our only option is to extend official recognition of the north's right to secede. If we cannot live under the same roof
column3: we shall be kind neighbors
column4: and perhaps even brothers in arms. May God help us all.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: FSA_second_declaration_of_independence_title;The Second Declaration of Independence;;;;;;;;;;;;x
FSA_second_declaration_of_independence_desc;As the founding fathers did before us
column2: so shall we stand up for our sovereign rights and not permit the interests of the South override what the North knows to be right and proper in our eyes. We shall be free
column3: and let no free man say otherwise.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: begin_hungarian_revolution_title;Begin the Revolution!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
begin_hungarian_revolution_desc;We must strike a blow against the Hapsburg monarchy
column2: in the name of Hungarian independence!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassal_rebellion_title;Demand Independence;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassal_rebellion_desc;We have attempted diplomatic efforts to achieve our freedom
column2: and been refused. Now our only hope is to demand our independence on threat of all-out war.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_hindustan2_title;Form Hindustan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_hindustan2_desc;We must unite the people of Hindustan under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_marathas2_title;Form Marathas;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_marathas2_desc;The Maratha Empire was once the greatest force upon the Indian subcontinent. The time has come for it to rise once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_bengal2_title;Claim Greater Bengal;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_bengal2_desc;The Bengal Empire once ruled over much of eastern India
column2: and the time has come to once again restake our claim. We must strike a blow against the forces of imperialism!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_dravidistan2_title;Form Dravidistan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_dravidistan2_desc;We must unite the Dravidian people under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_schleswig_title;Claim Schleswig;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_schleswig_desc;The duchies of Schleswig and Holstein have long been united and considered indivisible under the Danish crown
column2: but a question of royal claim to the duchies combined with the Holsteinian desire to join in the larger German Confederation to the south has led to considerable difficulty for King Frederick VII. The treatment of Danish people in Schleswig living under Holsteinian domination has led to a call for the duchy to be incorporated into Denmark proper. This is unlikely to be looked on favorably by the conservative German aristocracy in Holstein.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_japan_title;Unite With Japan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_japan_desc;The time has come to reconcile with the Japanese government
column2: and unite our nations for the good of the Japanese destiny.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_nigeria_title;Organize Nigeria;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_nigeria_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule-- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: reorganize_nigeria_title;Claim Nigeria;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reorganize_nigeria_desc;Now that we have taken possession of this African colony
column2: we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_togo_title;Organize Togo;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_togo_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule-- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators
