column1: reorganize_gambia_title;Claim the Gambia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reorganize_gambia_desc;Now that we have taken possession of this African colony
column2: we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reorganize_angola_title;Claim Angola;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reorganize_angola_desc;Now that we have taken possession of this African colony
column2: we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reorganize_mozambique_title;Claim Mozambique;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reorganize_mozambique_desc;Now that we have taken possession of this African colony
column2: we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_niamey_title;Move Capital to Niamey;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_niamey_desc;Niamey provides a better capital for Niger-- we should move the government there at once.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_bamako_title;Move Capital to Bamako;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_bamako_desc;Niamey provides a better capital for Mali-- we should move the government there at once.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_dar_es_salaam_title;Move Capital to Dar-es-Salaam;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_dar_es_salaam_desc;Dar-es-Salaam provides a better capital for Tanganyika-- we should move the government there at once.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_malaya_title;Unite Malaysia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_malaya_desc;We must unite all of the Malay peoples of the East Indies under a common banner. Down with the imperialists!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_malaya_title;Create Malaysia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_malaya_desc;A unified and civilized federation of the Malay peoples will provide a stronger ally for our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_hungary_title;Flee to Budapest;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_hungary_desc;With the loss of Vienna
column2: the Austro-Hungarian government must flee to Budapest instead. The Hungarians will not
column3: however
column4: continue with the arrangement of the Dual Monarchy-- not when what is left of Austria has been lost. The Hungarians will instead become the new power in our union
column5: taking over what remains of our Empire and ruling in our name.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_the_UK_title;Reclaim the British Isles;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_the_UK_desc;We must rise up and reclaim all of the British Isles-- the old Empire will exist once again!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reform_the_UK_title;Reform the United Kingdom;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reform_the_UK_desc;Now that we have reclaimed the British Isles we must restore them to a single
column2: united rule once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_hausaland_title;Become Hausaland;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_hausaland_desc;The hausa have come to increasingly dominate the Caliphate and its court
column2: and it is time Sokoto reflected that fact.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_toucouleur_title;Found the Tukulor Empire;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_toucouleur_desc;The Jihad must continue! With the cities of the central deserts under our control
column2: now is the time to found a united empire that will resist the coming onslaught of the colonial powers!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_mali_empire_title;Restore the Mali Empire;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_mali_empire_desc;The Mali Empire was once one of the greatest kingdoms in all of Africa. Under the ancient flag we can unite the peoples of the western Sahel
column2: and challenge the might even of the Europeans!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_somalia_title;Unite Somaliland;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_somalia_desc;We must unite all Somalis under a single
column2: unified flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_ethiopia_ETH_title;Unite Ethiopia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_ethiopia_ETH_desc;The civil war is over. Ethiopia must be one nation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_ethiopia_SHW_title;Unite Shewa;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_ethiopia_SHW_desc;The civil war is over. Shewa must be one nation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
recognize_cuba_title;Recognize Cuban Independence;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
recognize_cuba_desc;The Cubans have established themselves as a free country
column2: and it falls on the Americans as descendants of the Sons of Liberty to officially recognize their independence and encourage their growth as American allies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recognize_phillipines_title;Recognize Filipino Independence;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
recognize_phillipines_desc;The Filipinos have established themselves as a free country
column2: and it falls on the Americans as descendants of the Sons of Liberty to officially recognize their independence and encourage their growth as American allies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: release_silesia_title;Release Silesia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
release_silesia_desc;With our holdings in Silesia cut off from the rest of Austria
column2: it only makes sense that we give the locals more autonomy. Let the Polish raise their own armies-- so long as they do so in the service of the Austrian crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: release_dalmatia_title;Release Dalmatia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
release_dalmatia_desc;With our holdings in Dalmatia cut off from the rest of Austria
column2: it only makes sense that we give the locals more autonomy. Let the Polish raise their own armies-- so long as they do so in the service of the Austrian crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_austrian_silesia_title;Claim Silesia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_austrian_silesia_desc;The provinces of Bielsko and Tesin are rightfully Czech lands
column2: having once belonged to Bohemia. We must reclaim them as our own.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_croatia_title;Unite with Croatia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_croatia_desc;Now that Croatia has been formed
column2: the time has come for us to join the motherland.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invite_slovenia_to_YUG_title;Invite Slovenia Into Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_slovenia_to_YUG_desc;Our Slovenian neighbours wold surely be willing to join the Slavic union. Perhaps we should extend a hand to them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_bosnia_to_YUG_title;Invite Bosnia Into Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_bosnia_to_YUG_desc;Our Bosnian neighbours wold surely be willing to join the Slavic union. Perhaps we should extend a hand to them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_croatia_to_YUG_title;Invite Croatia Into Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_croatia_to_YUG_desc;Our Croatian neighbours wold surely be willing to join the Slavic union. Perhaps we should extend a hand to them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_montenegro_to_YUG_title;Invite Montenegro Into Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_montenegro_to_YUG_desc;Our Montenegrin neighbours wold surely be willing to join the Slavic union. Perhaps we should extend a hand to them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_serbia_to_YUG_title;Invite Serbia Into Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_serbia_to_YUG_desc;Our Serbian neighbours wold surely be willing to join the Slavic union. Perhaps we should extend a hand to them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_bulgaria_to_YUG_title;Invite Bulgaria Into Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_bulgaria_to_YUG_desc;While the Bulgarians are noticeably reluctant to assent to any kind of greater union of the Balkans
column2: perhaps with enough influence and good relations we can convince them to join us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invite_macedonia_to_YUG_title;Invite Macedonia Into Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_macedonia_to_YUG_desc;While the Macedonians are noticeably reluctant to assent to any kind of greater union of the Balkans
column2: perhaps with enough influence and good relations we can convince them to join us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invite_greece_to_YUG_title;Invite Greece Into Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_greece_to_YUG_desc;While the Greeks are not truly considered part of the Slavic culture and are noticeably reluctant to assent to any kind of greater union of the Balkans
column2: perhaps with enough influence and good relations we can convince them to join us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_bosnians_YUG_title;Embrace Bosniaks;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_bosnians_YUG_desc;The Bosniaks are historically a Muslim culture
column2: and notoriously at odds with the rest of the Slavs. With enough effort
column3: however
column4: it should not be impossible to integrate them more fully into the Yugoslav culture and government. Perhaps this might even mean a future of peace between our peoples.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_bulgarians_YUG_title;Embrace Bulgarians;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_bulgarians_YUG_desc;The Bulgarians often do not consider themselves true Slavs
column2: or perhaps they simply think themselves superior? Either way relations with the Bulgarians have been difficult. With enough effort
column3: however
column4: it should not be impossible to integrate them more fully into the Yugoslav culture and government. Perhaps this might even mean a future of peace between our peoples.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_greeks_YUG_title;Embrace Greeks;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_greeks_YUG_desc;The Greeks are not truly a Slavic culture
column2: and notoriously at odds with the rest of the Slavs. With enough effort
column3: however
column4: it should not be impossible to integrate them more fully into the Yugoslav culture and government. Perhaps this might even mean a future of peace between our peoples.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_albanians_YUG_title;Embrace Albanians;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_albanians_YUG_desc;The Albanians are not truly a Slavic culture
column2: and notoriously at odds with the rest of the Slavs. With enough effort
column3: however
column4: it should not be impossible to integrate them more fully into the Yugoslav culture and government. Perhaps this might even mean a future of peace between our peoples.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_yugoslavia_bulgaria_title;The End of Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_bulgaria_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_greece_title;The End of Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_greece_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
zanzibar_sale_title;Sell Zanzibar;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
zanzibar_sale_desc;The Zanzibar coast is almost worthless to us
column2: but might be of value to the neighbouring colonial administration in Tanganyika. We should consider selling it for a tidy profit.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: mombasa_sale_title;Sell Mombasa;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
mombasa_sale_desc;The Mombasa coast is almost worthless to us
column2: but might be of value to the neighbouring colonial administration in Kenya. We should consider selling it for a tidy profit.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: create_cambodian_protectorate_title;Create Cambodian Protectorate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_cambodian_protectorate_desc;Fearing invasion by the Siamese
column2: the Cambodians have requested that we allow them to join the Dai Viet in protection by our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_laos_protectorate_title;Create Laotian Protectorate;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

create_laos_protectorate_desc;The Laotians will not be able to stand against their much larger neighbours?not without our help. We should approach them and offer our protection. The civilized thing to do.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
siamese_border_treaty_title;Siamese Border Treaty;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
siamese_border_treaty_desc;Siam includes within its borders a number of conquered peoples: Laotians
column2: Khmer and Vietnamese. A recent incident has brought to light an opportunity for us: demand that Siam release these lands
column3: which we can then incorporate into our Indochina holdings
column4: or face our wrath.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unequal_treaty_DAI_title;Treaty of Hanoi;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unequal_treaty_DAI_desc;The Vietnamese are in dire straits. They cannot hold out for much longer. Perhaps we should offer them the chance to go to the negotiating table
column2: and end this war between us?on terms very much in our own favor

column1: organize_laos_title;Organize Lan Xang;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_laos_desc;We should organize the Laotian colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule-- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: form_french_indochina_title;French Indochina;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_french_indochina_desc;With the colonial government taking form in Saigon
column2: French administrators have advised elevating the region to a full department-- clearly with eyes on expanding French colonial rule to neighbors in Southeast Asia.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_fiji_title;Annex Fiji;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
annex_fiji_desc;With Australian settlers having puchased land on the island of Fiji
column2: they have slowly become insinuated within the court of King Cakobau. So it is that recently
column3: when the king's lavish overspending saddled his kingdom with considerable debt
column4: the settlers offered to negotiate terms by which the British government would pay off the debt and annex the island as a new colony.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invest_in_irish_title;Invest in the Irish;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invest_in_irish_desc;In order to bring the Irish up to par as an integral part of the British Empire
column2: a great deal of investment will be needed-- to not only upgrade the decaying institutions which have been governing the island for centuries
column3: but to also end the system of absentee landowners which so pervades the island's bureaucracy and which makes it a model of inefficiency. Only once that is done can the Irish begin to be integrated as equal subjects under British law.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: irish_integration_title;Irish Integration;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
irish_integration_desc;Now that the Irish are equal subjects under British law
column2: steps may be taken to integrate them more fully into overall British culture.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_czech_minority_title;Embrace the Czech Minority;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_czech_minority_desc;We shall embrace our Czech citizens
column2: and elevate them to the status shared by that of the Hungarians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_slovene_minority_title;Embrace the Slovene Minority;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_slovene_minority_desc;We shall embrace our Slovene citizens
column2: and elevate them to the status shared by that of the Hungarians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_croat_minority_title;Embrace the Croat Minority;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_croat_minority_desc;We shall embrace our Croat citizens
column2: and elevate them to the status shared by that of the Hungarians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_polish_minority_title;Embrace the Polish Minority;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_polish_minority_desc;We shall embrace our Polish citizens
column2: and elevate them to the status shared by that of the Hungarians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recognize_the_csa_title;Officially recognize the CSA;;;;;;;;;;;;x
recognize_the_csa_desc;We will extend formal recognition of the Confederate States of America
column2: opening an embassy in their capital and formally establishing relations. The Yankees will
column3: of course
column4: not approve.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: right_to_secede_title;The Right to Secede;;;;;;;;;;;;x
right_to_secede_desc;The Civil War is over
column2: and despite our wishes the United States stands divided. Our only option is to extend official recognition of the south's right to secede. If we cannot live under the same roof
column3: we shall be kind neighbors
column4: and perhaps even brothers in arms. May God help us all.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: second_declaration_of_independence_title;The Second Declaration of Independence;;;;;;;;;;;;x
second_declaration_of_independence_desc;As the founding fathers did before us
column2: so shall we stand up for our sovereign rights and not permit the interests of the North override what the South knows to be right and proper in our eyes. We shall be free
column3: and let no free man say otherwise.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recognize_the_fsa_title;Officially recognize the FSA;;;;;;;;;;;;x
recognize_the_fsa_desc;We will extend formal recognition of the Free States of America
column2: opening an embassy in their capital and formally establishing relations. The USA will
column3: of course
column4: not approve.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: FSA_right_to_secede_title;The Right to Secede;;;;;;;;;;;;x
FSA_right_to_secede_desc;The Civil War is over
column2: and despite our wishes the United States stands divided. Our only option is to extend official recognition of the north's right to secede. If we cannot live under the same roof
column3: we shall be kind neighbors
column4: and perhaps even brothers in arms. May God help us all.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: FSA_second_declaration_of_independence_title;The Second Declaration of Independence;;;;;;;;;;;;x
FSA_second_declaration_of_independence_desc;As the founding fathers did before us
column2: so shall we stand up for our sovereign rights and not permit the interests of the South override what the North knows to be right and proper in our eyes. We shall be free
column3: and let no free man say otherwise.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_makran_title;The Great Game Comes to Makran;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_makran_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that Makran must be subjugated as a British colony
column2: or we risk losing it to Russian aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_panjab_title;The Great Game Comes to Panjab;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_panjab_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that the Panjab must be subjugated as a British colony
column2: or we risk losing it to Russian aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_sindh_title;The Great Game Comes to Sindh;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_sindh_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that the Sindh must be subjugated as a British colony
column2: or we risk losing it to Russian aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_mayotte_title;Annex Mayotte;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
annex_mayotte_desc;The ruler of the small island of Maore
column2: which French traders have dubbed 'Mayotte'
column3: is a primitive sultan who only broke away from Malagasy rule in recent years. He has petitioned the French government for status as a protectorate
column4: clearly preferring civilized rule to those of his neighbors.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_savoy_title;Claim Savoy;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_savoy_desc;While we had hoped to one day regain control over Savoy through diplomatic means
column2: with the formation of Italy that is now impossible. We must lay claim to Savoy
column3: and liberate the French therein through force of arms.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_poland_GER_title;Reclaim Poland;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_poland_GER_desc;Our lands in Poland were stripped from us unfairly. Now is the time to reclaim those lands in the name of Germany!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_poland_RUS_title;Reclaim Poland;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_poland_RUS_desc;Our lands in Poland were stripped from us unfairly. Now is the time to reclaim those lands in the name of Russia!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
appoint_von_bismarck_title;Appoint Otto von Bismarck;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
appoint_von_bismarck_desc;Our naton needs a great statesman as its Chancellor
column2: and we have just the man. Otto von Bismarck is currently the country's First Minister
column3: but appointed as the leader of our nation he could see it transformed on the world stage.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: otto_von_bismarck;Otto von Bismarck;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
otto_von_bismarck_desc;The current Chancellor of our nation
column2: von Bismarck is a remarkable statesman?perhaps one of the finest our nation will ever know.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_alsace_lorraine_title;Reclaim Alsace-Lorraine;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_alsace_lorraine_desc;The neighboring territory of Alsace-Lorraine is inhabited by German people
column2: and rightfully belongs to Germany. We renounced our rightful claim to it
column3: but perhaps the time has come for us to re-assert our claim and liberate the Germans who live there?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: purchase_spanish_pacific_title;Purchase the Spanish Pacific;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
purchase_spanish_pacific_desc;With the Spanish having lost their colonial facilities in Manila
column2: their Pacific holdings are difficult to administrate and incredibly expensive for them. Considering that our government's interests lie in obtaining a foothold in the Pacific
column3: we should perhaps approach them with the notion of purchasing these islands for ourselves.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: demand_retreat_from_india;Demand Retreat From India;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
demand_retreat_from_india_desc;The majority of India has been wrested from British control. A choice is upon us: either demand their retreat from the sub-continent
column2: freeing all their vassals and annexed lands
column3: or continue our war and hope to achieve our current goals. A British retreat may result in chaos
column4: and we certainly would not attain the war goals we have in play
column5: but it would at least take the British out of the equation for the years to come.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_delhi_title;Move Capital to Delhi;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_delhi_desc;Now that India has unified
column2: we should consider moving the capital to a more central-- and traditional-- city. Delhi: the heart of India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: ganghwa_treaty_title;Treaty of Ganghwa;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
ganghwa_treaty_desc;With our superior firepower over the Koreans
column2: it will be possible to blockade them into agreeing to our demands.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: iwakura_mission_title;Iwakura Mission;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
iwakura_mission_desc;Now that we are a power to be reckoned with
column2: the western nations cannot ignore us. An idea has surfaced to send a diplomatic mission to the West
column3: to not only attempt a renogotiation of the unequal treaties forced upon our nation in weaker times but also to learn more of their ways and assist in our own modernization.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: meiji_constitution_title;Meiji Constitution;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
meiji_constitution_desc;After an exhaustive study of western democratic methods
column2: japanese scholars have settled on a method of government where the Emperor will preside over an Imperial Diet
column3: elected by the people and yet preserving both Imperial power as well as our traditions. This
column4: they believe
column5: is the best way for Japan to move forward into the modern era.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: begin_line_of_advantage_title;The Line of Advantage;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
begin_line_of_advantage_desc;The concept of riekisen
column2: or the 'line of advantage'
column3: means that we must extend Japanese influence beyond our national borders in order to ensure our security. This means turning all of the Japanese military
column4: and indeed our people
column5: to the notion of foreign conquest and glory.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: line_of_advantage;Line of Advantage;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
line_of_advantage_desc;The concept of riekisen
column2: or the 'line of advantage'
column3: means that we must extend Japanese influence beyond our national borders in order to ensure our security. This means turning all of the Japanese military
column4: and indeed our people
column5: to the notion of foreign conquest and glory.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: refuse_line_of_advantage_title;The Path of Progress;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
refuse_line_of_advantage_desc;Instead of focusing on military might and conquest
column2: Japanese security must be provided by devotion to technological progress and reform. We must match the Western powers
column3: and quickly
column4: or they will surely take advantage and find Japan sorely unprepared.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: no_line_of_advantage;Path of Progress;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
no_line_of_advantage_desc;Instead of focusing on military might and conquest
column2: Japanese security must be provided by devotion to technological progress and reform. We must match the Western powers
column3: and quickly
column4: or they will surely take advantage and find Japan sorely unprepared.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_korea_title;Annex Korea;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
annex_korea_desc;Preserving the independence of Korea is too costly. If the 'line of advantage' is to be maintained
column2: we must push our borders well beyond their current sphere. Korea must be turned into a protectorate of the Empire
column3: for its own good as well as ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_korea_title;Claim Korea;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_korea_desc;With Korea under foreign rule
column2: our nation feels threatened. The 'line of advantage' means that protecting our borders means extending our influence beyond them
column3: and thus we must move to claim the Korean peninsula and wrest it from those who hold it in their grasp-- in the name of Korean freedom

column1: order_to_expel_barbarians_title;Order to Expel Barbarians;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
order_to_expel_barbarians_desc;Since the ascension of the Tokugawa Shogun
column2: the role of the Emperor has been confined to that of figurehead. We lead Japan
column3: yet we do not. Recently
column4: the leadership of the Shogun has come into question. His increasing inability to deal with foreigners in a way that shows any manner of leadership compels the Emperor to act-- with or without the Shogun's permission. We shall send out a call to the people in our own name
column5: demanding they rise up and throw out the foreigners that the Shogun will not.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: peace_with_the_emperor_title;Peace With the Emperor;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
peace_with_the_emperor_desc;Since the ascension of the Tokugawa Shogun
column2: the Emperor has remained a figurehead. Even so
column3: he is a leader of the Japanese people and
column4: at times
column5: has expressed dissatisfaction with our own position as ruler of Japan. This has caused conflict
column6: and should we reach a point where our positions are not so different-- and
column7: indeed
column8: the Emperor is satisfied with our ability to rule
column9: perhaps we can bring this conflict to an end once and for all.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_the_daimyos_title;Unite the Daimyos;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_the_daimyos_desc;With the daimyos under our complete dominance
column2: we will be in a position to fully bring them under the government's control. The divisions maintained by the han system weaken us as a whole-- the Shogunate must be strong and united if it is to move forward as a world power.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_shimonoseki_title;Treaty of Shimonoseki;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_shimonoseki_desc;With the Chinese resistance crumbling
column2: we are in a position to gain advantage-- namely the island of Formosa and reparations
column3: not to mention proving our own superiority in the conflict.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: anglo_japanese_alliance_title;The Anglo-Japanese Alliance;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
anglo_japanese_alliance_desc;With mutual enemies among the Great Powers
column2: perhaps it is best if the British Empire and our nation work together.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: austrian_form_south_german_confederation2_title;Become the South German Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
austrian_form_south_german_confederation2_desc;While Germany was not united until the proclamation of the German Empire
column2: following the Franco-Prussian war
column3: rising nationalism in the 19th century had meant that unification had been on the cards long before that
column4: with the Frankfurt assembly of 1848 being an important forerunner. By achieving a dominant position among the South German states
column5: we can form the South German Confederation.;Il fallut attendre la proclamation de l'Empire allemand qui suivit la guerre franco-allemande pour assister ?l'unification de l'Allemagne. Pourtant
column6: avec la mont? du nationalisme au XIXe si?le
column7: l'unification aurait ??possible bien avant cela
column8: comme en t?oigne l'assembl? de Francfort de 1848. En nous imposant dans les ?ats du sud
column9: nous formerons les ?ats du sud de l'Allemagne.;Obwohl Deutschland bis zur Proklamation des Deutschen Kaiserreichs nach dem deutsch-franz?ischen Krieg nicht geeint war
column10: bedeutete der steigende Nationalismus des neunzehnten Jahrhunderts
column11: dass eine Vereinigung schon seit langer Zeit geplant war. Ein wichtiges vorbereitendes Ereignis war die Frankfurter Nationalversammlung von 1848. Wenn wir uns eine dominierende Position unter den norddeutschen Staaten erarbeiten
column12: k?nen wir den S?deutschen Bund gr?den.;;Aunque Alemania no estuvo unida hasta la proclamaci? del Imperio Alem?
column14: el nacionalismo emergente del siglo XIX puso de relieve que la unificaci? era inevitable. La asamblea de Frankfurt de 1848 supuso un importante precedente. Al alcanzar una posici? dominante entre los estados germanos meridionales
column15: podemos formar la Confederaci? de Alemania del Sur.;;;;;;;;;x;;

column1: austrian_form_south_german_confederation_title;Create the South German Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
austrian_form_south_german_confederation_desc;With our dominant position over the south German states
column2: we can create the South German Confederation -- a union that would be under our full control
column3: and a more useful ally than the nations separately.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: mediate_belgian_independence_title;Mediate Belgian Independence;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
mediate_belgian_independence_desc;While Belgium's de facto independence from The Netherlands had been established by force of arms during the Belgian revolution of 1831
column2: it has not been confirmed de jure by The Netherlands and technically a state of war still exists between the two nations. The idea has arisen that the British Empire should step in and mediate a settlement
column3: demanding the Dutch give up their claims in return for guarantees of Belgian independence and control over Luxembourg. With the powers of Europe at the table
column4: it seems unlikely the Dutch would refuse.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_libya_TUR_title;Organize Libya;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_libya_TUR_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule -- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: reorganize_libya_title;Claim Libya;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reorganize_libya_desc;Now that we have taken possession of this African colony
column2: we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_algeria_title;Organize Algeria;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_algeria_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule -- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: organize_uganda_title;Organize Uganda;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_uganda_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule -- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: organize_zanzibar_title;Organize Zanzibar;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_zanzibar_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule -- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: organize_botswana_title;Organize Bechuanaland;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_bostwana_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule -- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: organize_sudan_title;Organize Sudan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_sudan_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule -- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: organize_ghana_title;Organize Ghana;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_ghana_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule -- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: organize_mauretania_title;Organize Mauretania;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_mauretania_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule -- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: organize_dahomey_title;Organize Dahomey;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_dahomey_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule -- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: move_capital_to_accra_title;Move Capital to Accra;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_accra_desc;Accra provides a better capital for our nation-- we should move the government there at once.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
convention_of_peking_title;The Peking Convention;;;;;;;;;;;;x
convention_of_peking_desc;Since the Treaty of Nerchinsk (1689)
column2: the Russian Empire has recognized the Aigun river and the Stanovoy mountains as the natural frontiers between Russia and China. There are many within the government
column3: however
column4: who believe it would be in our best interest to access a southern port upon the Sea of Japan -- namely the Chinese city of HaIshenwai. Considering the Chinese only barely control their northeastern provinces
column5: it seems within our right to negotiate for their control?and with their state of turmoil now if the best time to approach them.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: peking_convention_TPG_title;The Peking Convention;La convention de P?in.;Die Pekinger Konvention;;La convenci? de Pek?;;;;;;;;;x
peking_convention_TPG_desc;Since the Treaty of Nerchinsk (1689)
column2: the Russian Empire has recognized the Argun river and the Stanovoy mountains as the natural frontiers between Russia and China.  In the mid 19th century the Russians would expand beyond this border to seize the vast lands between the Stanovoy Mountains and the Amur River. The Western Allies would later bring the Second Opium War to a conclusion by burning the Chinese Emperor's summer palaces
column3: and entering Beijing. A cunning major general named Nikolay Ignatiev was able to convinced the Chinese that only Russian support would cause the allies to evacuate Peking. The price for this support was the Convention of Peking
column4: which confirmed Muravyov's gains and
column5: additionally
column6: ceded territory between the Ussuri River and the Pacific to Russia. Thus
column7: Russia had gained some 350
column8: 000 square miles of territory without firing a single shot.;Depuis le trait?de Nerchinsk (1689)
column9: l묮mpire russe a reconnu le fleuve Argun et les monts Stanovoy comme fronti?e naturelle entre la Russie et la Chine.  Au cours du XIXe si?le
column10: les Russes franchirent cette fronti?e pour s뭙mparer des vastes territoires entre les monts Stanovoy et le fleuve Amour. Les Puissances occidentales mirent plus tard un terme ?la seconde guerre de l뭥pium en br?ant les palais d믧t?de l뭙mpereur et en s뭙mparant de P?in. Un g??al russe avis?du nom de Nicola?Ignatiev parvint ?convaincre les chinois que seul le soutien de la Russie permettrait l'?acuation de P?in par les alli?. Le prix de ce soutien fut la convention de P?in
column11: qui ent?inait les conqu?es de Muravyov et c?ait ?la Russie les territoires entre le fleuve Ussuri et la c?e pacifique. Ainsi
column12: la Russie gagna-t-elle 560?00 kilom?res carr? sans tirer un coup de fusil.;Seit dem Vertrag von Nertschinsk (1689) hatte das russische Reich den Fluss Argun und das Stanowoigebirge als nat?liche Grenze zwischen Russland und China betrachtet. Mitte des 19. Jahrhunderts wollten die Russen diese Grenze erweitern
column13: um das weitr?mige Gebiet zwischen dem Stanowoigebirge und dem Fluss Amur zu annektieren. Sp?er beendeten die westlichen Alliierten den zweiten Opiumkrieg durch Niederbrennen der Sommerpal?te des chinesischen Kaisers und marschierten in Peking ein. Der gerissene Generalmajor Nikolai Ignatjew konnte die Chinesen ?erzeugen
column14: dass sie die Westm?hte nur mit russischer Unterst?zung zum Abzug bewegen k?nen w?den. Der Preis f? diese Unterst?zung war die Pekinger Konvention
column15: die Murawjows Forderungen best?igte und Russland zus?zlich noch das Territorium zwischen dem Fluss Ussuri und dem Pazifik zusprach. Russland hatte sich also einen Gebietsgewinn von 350000 Quadratmeilen verschafft
column16: ohne einen einzigen Schuss daf? abzufeuern.;;Desde el tratado de Nerchinsk (1689)
column17: el imperio ruso siempre hab? reconocido el r? Argun y la cordillera de Stanovoy como fronteras naturales entre Rusia y China.  A mediados del siglo XIX
column18: los rusos se expandir?n m? all?de esta frontera para apoderarse de los vastos territorios situados entre las monta?s Stanovoy y el r? Amur. M? adelante
column19: los pa?es occidentales pondr?n fin a la Segunda Guerra del Opio incendiando los palacios estivales del emperador de China y ocupando Pek?. Un astuto general llamado Nikolay Ignatiev logr?convencer a los chinos de que solo el apoyo de Rusia obligar? a los aliados a evacuar la capital. El precio de este apoyo fue la convenci? de Pek?
column20: donde se confirmaron las ganancias obtenidas por Muravyov y
column22: China cedi?a Rusia nuevos territorios entre el r? Ussuri y el Pac?ico. De este modo
column23: Rusia adquiri?unas 350.000 millas cuadradas de territorio sin tener que disparar un solo tiro.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: mongolian_protectorate_title;The Mongolian Protectorate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
mongolian_protectorate_desc;Our influence in Mongolia is such that we are in a position to pry the nation away from the Chinese and into our control. They would be our vassals
column2: benefiting from protection against Chinese claims on their land.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: valparaiso_harbor_title;The Jewel of the Pacific;;;;;;;;;;;;x
valparaiso_harbor_desc;Valparaiso has became a required stopover for ships crossing between the Atlantic and Pacific oceans. In its role as a major seaport
column2: Valparaiso receives immigrants from many European countries
column3: but this could change if a new route was to open.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_easter_island_title;Annex Easter Island;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
annex_easter_island_desc;The native population of Easter Island has suffered many devastations in recent years
column2: from attacks by Peruvian pirates to a tuberculosis epidemic. A colonist has operated a sheep ranch there for some years
column3: and recently offered to sell to our government. Considering his ranch covers a large portion of the island
column4: we would be well within our rights to claim sovereignty over it.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: declare_neutrality_title;Declare Swiss Neutrality;;;;;;;;;;;;x
declare_neutrality_desc;The Swiss have little interest in the wars of Europe.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
abandon_neutrality_title;Abandon Swiss Neutrality;;;;;;;;;;;;x
abandon_neutrality_desc;The might of the Swiss army is such that we can repel our neighbors without difficulty. Our policy of neutrality is no longer necessary.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
violate_neutrality_title;Violate Swiss Neutrality;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
violate_neutrality_desc;The Swiss may have declared themselves 'neutral'
column2: but if they believe that will stop us-- if they believe the opinion of any of their allies will stop us-- then they are sorely mistaken.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: build_addis_ababa_title;Build Addis Ababa;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
build_addis_ababa_desc;Founded in 1886 by Emperor Menelik II
column2: Addis Ababa would become the capital of Ethiopia and the site of the Imperial Palace.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: eth_mission_to_cairo_title;Mission to Cairo;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
eth_mission_to_cairo_desc;The strained relations between Ethiopia and Egypt must come to an end. We each have our respective lands
column2: and truly there is no reason for us to fight. At worst
column3: continued conflict will leave both our nations weak to exploitation by foreign powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: belize_purchase_title;Belize Purchase;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
belize_purchase_desc;We are interested in purchasing Belize from Great Britain and integrating it into the United States of Central America. As such
column2: we have have sent delegates overseas to London and are currently awaiting a reply.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_the_ikhwan_title;Alliance with the Wahhabists;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_the_ikhwan_desc;An alliance with the Wahhabist religious order among the Bedouins will give us precisely the force we need to unite Arabia under our rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_flanders_title;Become Flanders;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_flanders_desc;Without the Wallonians
column2: it is time for the Flemish to rule once again.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_wallonia_title;Become Wallonia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_wallonia_desc;Without the Flemish
column2: it is time for the Wallonian flag to fly once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_belgium_FLA_title;Unite Belgium;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_belgium_FLA_desc;The Flemish and the Wallonians may re-unite under a single flag. Long live Belgium!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_belgium_WLL_title;Unite Belgium;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_belgium_WLL_desc;The Flemish and the Wallonians may re-unite under a single flag. Long live Belgium!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
colonial_destiny_title;Colonial Destiny;;;;;;;;;;;;x
colonial_destiny_desc;It is the destiny of the Belgian people to civilize the last remaining wilds of the world. To Africa!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
self_strengthening_movement;Self-Strengthening Movement;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
self_strengthening_movement_title;Self-Strengthening Movement;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
self_strengthening_movement_desc;We cannot take a back seat to the western nations. We must make strides towards modernizing
column2: no matter the cost!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: ultimatum_to_portugal_title;Send Ultimatum to Portugal;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

ultimatum_to_portugal_desc;It is in the British government's best interests to expand our colonies in southern Africa northwards. This will be impossible if the Portuguese complete their dreams of the 'Pink Map' by connecting Angola and Mozambique. We must make our demand or face the possibility of surrendering central Africa to other powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_nanking_title;Treaty of Nanking;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_nanking_desc;Using our new influence with the Chinese government
column2: we can force them to the table and extract trade and territory concessions-- not the least of which will be the cession of Hong Kong
column3: a valuable port to possess on the southern seas.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: simla_convention_title;The Simla Convention;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
simla_convention_desc;Now that Tibet is a free nation
column2: it might be prudent for our government to step forward and broker an arrangement. Tibet could be a useful ally
column3: and anything that weakens the Chinese government is not an opportunity to pass up.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: demand_retreat_from_india_title;Demand Retreat From India;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
demand_retreat_from_india_desc;The majority of India has been wrested from British control. A choice is upon us: either demand their retreat from the sub-continent
column2: freeing all their vassals and annexed lands
column3: or continue our war and hope to achieve our current goals. A British retreat may result in chaos
column4: and we certainly would not attain the war goals we have in play
column5: but it would at least take the British out of the equation for the years to come.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_fsa_title;Join the FSA;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_fsa_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the new FSA banner. Long live the Sons of Liberty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_new_csa_title;Join the Confederacy;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_new_csa_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the new Confederate banner. Long live the South!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_algiers_title;Move Capital to Algiers;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_algiers_desc;Algiers now belongs to us. It is time to move our government back to its proper place!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_assyria_title;Claim Greater Assyria;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_assyria_desc;Our people lie scattered  under the rule of foreign nations-- we must bring them under our banner and reclaim the lands which were once ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
chuang_guangdong_title;Chuang Guandong;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
chuang_guangdong_desc;Literally 'Crashing into Guandong'
column2: this was the a policy brought into place by the Qing government which brought down the barrier to non-Manchu settlement in the northeastern frontier. With the loss of Outer Manchuria
column3: it is vital that the frontier be populated by settlers to prevent further expansion into Chinese territory.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_palestine_title;Reclaim Palestine;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_palestine_desc;The Israelis have unlawfully occupied our lands. Now is the time to reclaim them for Palestine!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME20110;Natives in $STATENAME$;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC20110;A recent demonstration in $PROVINCENAME$ has brought attention to the plight of natives in $STATENAME$
column2: namely to their oppression by the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government and their demands for independence. If something isn't done soon we may be facing intervention by foreign powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME20111;Trouble in $STATENAME$;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC20111;A recent riot in $PROVINCENAME$ has brought a great deal of attention to $STATENAME$-- the kind that would normally prompt the great powers to consider intervention. It seems
column2: however
column3: that the demands for independence by 'uncivilized' peoples has largely fallen on deaf ears. News of the trouble has faded away as quickly as it began.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME20112;Long Memories;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC20112;While recent trouble in $STATENAME$ has raised the spectre of foreign intervention once again
column2: there are many who remember the last crisis over $STATENAME$'s people as if it were yesterday. Try as they might
column3: the world is simply not ready to listen to them again-- yet.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME20115;Incident in $STATENAME$;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC20115;A demonstration by $PROVINCECULTURE$ citizens in $PROVINCENAME$ quickly got out of hand as $COUNTRY_ADJ$ soldiers shot into the crowd to disperse it. A riot ensued
column2: and several protestors were slain. Throughout $STATENAME$
column3: the reaction has been one of outrage-- and there is an effort by some $PROVINCECULTURE$ malcontents to draw the attention of the world
column4: just one more example of $COUNTRY$'s disregard for peace and civilized behavior-- or so they'll say.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME32520;The Eastern Islands;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC32520;The islands of Sakhalin and the Kurils are a natural extension of our holdings in Okhotsk and Kamchatka
column2: and we must seek to claim these lands before the Japanese do.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME32521;Treaty of Shimoda;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC32521;Vice-Admiral Yevfimy Putiatin has sailed from Russia to $COUNTRY$ on a mission to establish formal relations and to define the borders between our respective territories. After months of negotiation
column2: we have agreed to open three ports to Russian merchants and to guarantee Russian ships access through $COUNTRY_ADJ$ waters and straits. Both sides have agreed that our borders in the Kuril Islands lay just north of Etorofu
column3: and propose to share sovereignty over Sakhalin Island. The finished treaty was signed on February 7th
column4: $YEAR$ in Shimoda.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA32521;May our empires prosper together!;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME32522;Trouble in Sakhalin;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC32522;Conflict is brewing in Sakhalin. Shared sovereignty has failed
column2: and with no official border between the Russian and Japanese claims
column3: settlers from both sides now fight over territory. For stability's sake
column4: we must clearly define our borders
column5: once and for all. There are several solutions we could propose: first
column6: we could officially divide the island between us and Japan
column7: essentially legalising the status quo. This would be generous of us
column8: and it would improve our relations with Japan. Second
column9: we could push for full control of Sakhalin
column10: offering in return to concede the northern Kuril Islands and make resettlement payments to those displaced. This would represent a modest profit
column11: but Japan might not agree to it. Finally
column12: we could demand full control of Sakhalin and offer nothing in return. This would hurt our reputation
column13: and it would badly offend the Japanese
column14: who would probably refuse. How should our diplomats proceed?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC32523;It seems that conflict is brewing in Sakhalin. Shared sovereignty has failed
column2: and with no official border between the Russian claims and ours
column3: settlers from both sides now fight over territory. The Russian recently approached us
column4: all smiles and willingness to co-operate. They have offered to make the current status quo official: Sakhalin will have a border drawn dividing it in two. Considering the fact they could have forced the issue
column5: it seems they want us to be friends rather than enemies.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC32524;It seems that conflict is brewing in Sakhalin. Shared sovereignty has failed
column2: and with no official border between the Russian claims and ours
column3: settlers from both sides now fight over territory. For stability's sake
column4: we must clearly define our borders
column5: once and for all. Now the Russians have proposed an exchange of border territories: we would give them complete control of Sakhalin
column6: and in return they would cede the northern Kuril Islands all the way to Kamchatka. Russia has also offered to make resettlement payments to help Japanese to relocate from Sakhalin. We can accept their proposal
column7: or we can insist on preserving the present borders in Sakhalin.If we accept
column8: we will lose a modest territory but improve relations with Russia. On the other hand
column9: if we insist on the status quo
column10: we will keep our present territory but risk escalating the conflict.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC32525;It seems conflict is brewing in Sakhalin. Shared sovereignty has failed
column2: and with no official border between the Russian claims and ours
column3: settlers from both sides now fight over territory. For stability's sake
column4: we must clearly define our borders
column5: once and for all. Now the Russians have outrageously demanded that we give them full control of Sakhalin
column6: in exchange for nothing! Their negotiators hint darkly at Russian ships shelling Japanese ports if we should refuse. We can accept their proposal
column7: or we can insist on preserving the present borders in Sakhalin. If we give in
column8: we will lose a promising colony and look weak to other nations. But
column9: if we insist on the status quo
column10: the conflict is likely to escalate into open war.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME32526;Refused!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC32526;The Japanese have refused our proposal
column2: and they now insist that they will settle for nothing less than the present division of Sakhalin. We can back down and accept the status quo
column3: or we can use force to get our way. If we accept the status quo after reaching for more
column4: we will look weak to the other Powers
column5: though relations with Japan will be preserved. But
column6: our only other option now is to declare aggressive war for the islands
column7: which will hurt our reputation abroad.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME32527;Treaty of Saint Petersburg;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC32527;The treaty has been signed! Our borders in Sakhalin and the Kurils are now settled
column2: and ships from both empires have been guaranteed access through the Strait of Tartary and the Sea of Okhotsk. This should ease tensions in the region considerably and ensure close diplomatic ties between our nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC32528;The war for Sakhalin is lost! Russia has been compelled to acknowledge Japan's sovereignty over the south of the island. One day
column2: we will make this right --- but
column3: for now
column4: we are beaten.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC32529;The war for Sakhalin is won! We have successfully defended ourselves against Russia's misguided aggression
column2: and the Russians have been forced into a treaty acknowledging Japanese sovereignty. Peace has been restored to Sakhalin!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC32530;The war for Sakhalin is won! Russia has enforced its rule over the entire island
column2: and the Japanese have been forced into a treaty renouncing their claims. Peace has been restored to Sakhalin!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC32531;The war for Sakhalin is lost! We have been compelled to agree to a humiliating peace and acknowledge Russia's sovereignty. One day
column2: we will make this right --- but
column3: for now
column4: we are beaten.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME33030;The German East Africa Company;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC33030;The Society for German Colonization has been attempting to colonize the Zanzibar coast for several years now
column2: having formed the German East Africa company and signed several treaties with Swahili tribes. It now seems they are facing difficulty with rebellions and have asked us to step in. The Sultan of Zanzibar will doubtlessly object if we do
column3: as he claims authority over the coast -- even if his actual authority is minimal -- but so what if he does? This may be an interesting opportunity.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME33031;German Warships!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC33031;For the last several years
column2: Swahili tribes on the coast have been making treaties with Europeans
column3: allowing them to create small settlements. We knew this would be trouble
column4: and we were right. Powerful warships have arrived from $FROMCOUNTRY$
column5: a demonstration of their power as they make a demand for the entirety of the coast. If we do this
column6: they say
column7: we shall be safe from further molestation-- and they claim we do not truly control the coast anyhow.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME37235;The Algerian Rebellion;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC37235;Not long ago
column2: Algerian bitterness towards Ottoman rule made them almost welcome French intervention. Our colonization of Algiers and the northern coast
column3: however
column4: has given rise to a resistance under the leadership of Emir Abdel Kadir. The man has united the Maghrebi tribes
column5: and now has launched attacks on several colonial settlements.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC97130;With the arrival of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ colonial governor into $PROVINCENAME$
column2: an effort has begun to incorporate $COUNTRY_ADJ$ $STATENAME$ into the larger Indonesian colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME97570;Native Unrest in $STATENAME$;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC97570;Now that $COUNTRY$ is free
column2: native $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizens are beginning to protest against the colonial regime that still remains. Foreigners still hold the highest positions in the government
column3: and have a privileged status in comparison to those they once ruled over as a colony. In $PROVINCENAME$
column4: the recent arrest of a native for trespassing on the estate of a foreigner has led to riots -- and dissension has spread throughout all of $STATENAME$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME97666;The Rebellion is Over;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC97666;Saigo Takamori is dead -- some say he committed seppuku after receiving a wound-- and the rebellion he inspired is now ended. To many
column2: this was the last gasp of the ancient samurai?and a new way for $COUNTRY$ on the path of progress now lies ahead.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME97680;The Sakhalin Question;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC97680;Japan has quarreled with Russia before over the rule of Sakhalin Island. Now
column2: our influence in China and Korea has led to renewed friction between our nations. The Line of Advantage dictates that we must extend our control over the whole of Sakhalin and establish a stronger northern border. But are we willing to risk war with a European power?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME97681;The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Demand;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC97681;The warmongers in the Japanese government are now demanding that Russia cede Sakhalin and the Kuril Islands entirely to them. To give up so much territory without a fight would make us look very weak
column2: but Japan's might has grown tremendously in recent decades. Can we risk a war in the Pacific?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98900;With the arrival of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ colonial governor into $PROVINCENAME$
column2: an effort has begun to incorporate $COUNTRY_ADJ$ $STATENAME$ into the larger South African colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98905;With the arrival of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ colonial governor into $PROVINCENAME$
column2: an effort has begun to incorporate $COUNTRY_ADJ$ $STATENAME$ into the larger colonial administration of Rupert's Land.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME99000;The Righteous Harmony Society;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC99000;'Support the Qing! Destroy the Foreign!'/n/nMany Chinese are growing enraged at the continuing encroachment of westerners into the Empire. They walk freely
column2: spread Christianity with impunity
column3: and ignore Imperial laws. A movement called the Righteous Harmony Society -- known to foreigners as 'Boxers' -- has appeared
column4: their mission to drive western influence out of the Qing Empire by any means necessary. Some are worried that attacks upon westerners could bring foreign anger down upon us
column5: but there are those who see this as a good thing. Anger against westerners
column6: even if it means a degree of chaos and disruption in our provinces
column7: means support for the Qing government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME99001;Boxers in $STATENAME$;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC99001;An attack upon a foreign merchant in $PROVINCENAME$ has signaled the arrival of the Boxer movement to $STATENAME$. Already the flags of the Righteous Harmony Society have been spotted
column2: their followers recruiting fellow Chinese to support the Qing government in their struggle.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME99005;Attack on Foreigners in $STATENAME$;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC99005;Throughout all of $STATENAME$
column2: the Boxers are attacking western influence. Smugglers
column3: missionaries
column4: opium peddlers?anyone they can apprehend is being slain or forced to flee for their lives. We have a choice: either look the other way
column5: risking anger from the great powers for these 'atrocities'
column6: or send in forces to suppress the Boxers and risk the anger of our own people.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME99006;Boxer Atrocities in $FROMCOUNTRY$;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC99006;A group of Chinese nationalists known as the 'Boxers'
column2: intent on driving all western influence out of $FROMCOUNTRY$
column3: have attacked a group of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizens. Several were slain
column4: while others were forced to flee for their lives. Worse
column5: the Qing government has done nothing about it. They are looking the other way while these atrocities are being committed upon our people.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME99010;Boxers Attack Legation Quarter!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC99010;The Boxers have reached the capital of $COUNTRY$
column2: streaming into $CAPITAL$ to attack foreigners -- and
column3: far more noteworthy
column4: they have laid siege to the Legation Quarter. Hundreds of foreign dignitaries and merchants reside within. If we do not step in to protect them
column5: it will be seen as a declaration of support for the Boxers and an act of war against the great powers. If we do
column6: the Boxers will see it as a betrayal of their cause and perhaps even rise up in rebellion against us. They have forced our hand now
column7: however
column8: and we have no choice but to act.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME99011;Boxers Attack $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Legation;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC99011;The Boxer situation in $FROMCOUNTRY$ has reached a head: the Chinese nationalists have entered Peking
column2: laying siege to the Legation Quarter and putting the lives of dozes of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ merchants and dignitaries at risk. The Qing government has looked the other way
column3: an act that is seen by the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government as a declaration of war. Many are calling upon us to intervene in order to protect $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizens from these barbarians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME99015;The Boxer Protocol;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC99015;We are forced to submit to the foreign demands
column2: signing a treaty with the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ generals and representatives from all the great powers. The Righteous Harmony Society will be forcibly disbanded
column3: its leaders executed or imprisoned
column4: and our government is once again humiliated.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC99016;$FROMCOUNTRY$ has submitted to the intervening powers
column2: signing a treaty that promises to forcibly dismantle the Boxers and pay reparations for the atrocities committed in their name-- and explicitly supported by the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME900640;The Cyprus Convention;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC900640;An idea has arisen within the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government: could we perhaps offer our support to the Ottomans in the upcoming Congress
column2: in exchange for a lease on Cyprus? Our support could make a great deal of difference for them... and the island's proximity to Suez makes it of strategic importance. The Ottomans could use all the support they can get
column3: after all.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC900641;The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government has approached us with a proposal: they will lend their support to us in the upcoming Congress
column2: in exchange for Cyprus. The island's proximity to Suez makes it of strategic importance
column3: after all
column4: and while some might consider the offer an insult there are others who suggest that without this offer it's just as likely the island will be offered to Greece. $FROMCOUNTRY$ could ensure it isn't... and we could use all the allies in the Congress we can get.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME900645;The Bosnian Issue;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC900645;$COUNTRY$ has a reasonable issue to bring before the upcoming Congress: while it seems beyond question that the Bosnians will be given independence
column2: we could make a case for $COUNTRY_ADJ$ stewardship over Bosnia at the Congress and it seems likely we would be heeded... though it would
column3: without a doubt
column4: upset the Russians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME900646;The Croatian Issue;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC900646;$COUNTRY$ has a reasonable issue to bring before the upcoming Congress: while it seems beyond question that the Croatians will be given independence
column2: we could make a case for $COUNTRY_ADJ$ stewardship over Croatia at the Congress and it seems likely we would be heeded... though it would
column3: without a doubt
column4: upset the Russians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC900710;$FROMCOUNTRY$ received a great deal of benefit from the recent Congress of great powers
column2: and it was decided that $COUNTRY$ deserves great influence in $FROMCOUNTRY$ as compensation-- if we want it.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC900711;$FROMCOUNTRY$ received a great deal of benefit from the recent Congress of great powers
column2: and it was decided that $COUNTRY$ deserves considerable influence in $FROMCOUNTRY$ as compensation-- if we want it.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC900712;$FROMCOUNTRY$ received a great deal of benefit from the recent Congress of great powers
column2: and it was decided that $COUNTRY$ deserves considerable some small influence in $FROMCOUNTRY$ as compensation-- if we want it.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME900715;Legacy of the Congress;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC900715;$COUNTRY_ADJ$ delegates were sent to the recent Congress-- reasonable considering it was the fate of our country and the entire Balkans that was being decided
column2: or so we thought. As it turns out
column3: the great powers of Europe decided what was to become of $COUNTRY$ without our participation
column4: and while we received some benefit it has come to us at a price.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME1316089;The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Victory;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC1316089;$FROMCOUNTRY$ has won its war against us. Now their generals walk into $CAPITAL$
column2: gloating with their superiority. It seems that
column3: should they force us to the negotiating table to demand yet more concessions
column4: we will have little choice but to comply.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME1316090;The Treaty of Shimonoseki;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC1316090;We have won a great victory against $FROMCOUNTRY$. Now we must consider-- do we negotiate with them
column2: perhaps promising the return of some of their land in exchange for the island of Formosa and reparations? Or do we stay our current course and perhaps alarm the Western nations at our advances into $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ territory?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME1316091;The Unequal Treaty;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC1316091;We have won a great war against $FROMCOUNTRY$. Now we are faced with a dilemma: do we force the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government to the negotiating table
column2: perhaps promising the return of some of their land in exchange for a treaty port and reparations? Or do we stay our current course and perhaps alarm the other great powers at our advances into $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ territory?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME1316092;The Unequal Treaty;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC1316092;As we thought
column2: the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ infidels have forced a so-called 'treaty' upon us
column3: demanding a great deal of reparations and land concession-- in return for land they currently possess but have no more right to.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: north_borneo_company_title;북모르네오 조차;Lease North Borneo;;;;;;;;;;;;x

north_borneo_company_desc;Rights to trading ports along the northern coast of Borneo have been granted to several companies through treaties-- and have recently fallen to Alfred Dent of London. Through him
column2: we may conduct a new treaty that turns these rights into colonial concessions. Considering that the control of the local sultans over these areas is murky at best
column3: and more than one has sometimes granted rights to the same areas
column4: it truly seems as if we are obtaining clearance for the creation of a British North Borneo Company rather than wresting land from the natives.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaties_of_velasco;Treaties of Velasco;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaties_of_velasco_desc;The treaties may be worth less than the paper they're printed on
column2: but they supposedly offer us a guarantee of independence from Mexico. We shall see if they last.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: league_of_three_emperors2_title;The League of Three Emperors;;;;;;;;;;;;x
league_of_three_emperors2_desc;After the defeat of Napoleon
column2: a Holy Alliance was once formed between Prussia
column3: Austria and Russia. Perhaps the time has come to resurrect that alliance
column4: a common front between our three monarchies to stand against the wave of revolution and change and Europe?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_indonesia_title;Organize Indonesia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
organize_indonesia_desc;Our colonies in the East Indies are becoming a true part of the country. We must create the proper structures
column2: so that they stand on par with our other national states.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reorganize_indonesia_title;Claim Indonesia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reorganize_indonesia_desc;Now that we have taken possession of this East Indies colony
column2: we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reorganize_south_africa_title;Claim South Africa;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reorganize_south_africa_desc;Now that we have taken possession of the Cape Colony
column2: we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recent_crisis;최근 분쟁;Recent Crisis;;;;;;;;;;;;x
recent_crisis_desc;최근 분쟁을 선동했습니다. 기억들이 사라질 때까지
column2: 세계는 우리의 영토에 대한 요구를 간과하는 경향이 있을 것입니다.;We have been the instigators in a recent crisis. Until memories fade
column3: the world will likely tend to overlook any further demands we make for our territories.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_satsuma_title;Total War in Satsuma;;;;;;;;;;;;x
total_war_in_satsuma_desc;The rebellion for all that is honorable and traditional in Japan is now upon us. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_transcaucasia_GEO_title;The End of Transcaucasia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_transcaucasia_GEO_desc;The Transcaucasian union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_transcaucasia_AZB_title;The End of Transcaucasia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_transcaucasia_AZB_desc;The Transcaucasian union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_transcaucasia_ARM_title;The End of Transcaucasia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_transcaucasia_ARM_desc;The Transcaucasian union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
japanese_sakhalin_title;Japanese Sakhalin;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
japanese_sakhalin_desc;With Japan now in full control of Sakhalin and the Kurils
column2: the world must recognize that these islands are essentially part of the Japanese archipelago and know them by their Japanese names.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: russian_sakhalin_title;Russian Sakhalin;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
russian_sakhalin_desc;With the hated Japanese finally driven out of Sakhalin and Russia in full control of the islands
column2: Russian administration and names can at last be restored.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_sakhalin_title;Claim Sakhalin;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_sakhalin_desc;Russia has ruled lands on Sakhalin Island for some time now
column2: and much of the archipelago's population is Russian. It's time we let the world know that we consider these lands to be a core Russian territory
column3: which we will defend to the last!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: putiatin_mission_title;The Putiatin Mission;;;;;;;;;;;;x
putiatin_mission_desc;The Japanese islands have only recently begun to communicate with the larger world. Considering the border we share in the Kurils
column2: it might be prudent to send a mission to open up formal diplomatic ties with the Japanese and work out an arrangement to avoid future conflict over the islands.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: french_language_schooling_title;French Language Schooling;;;;;;;;;;;;x
french_language_schooling_desc;A motion has been put forward by the minister Jules Ferry
column2: namely that not only should schooling in France be free -- but that it must be solely in French. Langues d'oc and other forms of patois must be stamped out so that France has cultural unity. That
column3: he says
column4: will give our nation the strength it needs to fully modernize.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: french_cultural_unity;French Cultural Unity;;;;;;;;;;;;x
french_cultural_unity_desc;New schooling policies are slowly assimilating patois-speaking Frenchmen.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
rebel_cell_discovered;반군 점조직 발견;Rebel Cell Discovered;;;;;;;;;;;;x
rebel_cell_discovered_desc;반군의 점조직을 발견했습니다. 이제 나머지를 찾아내서 도살하는 건 시간문제입니다!;With one rebel cell uncovered
column2: it's only a matter of time before we discover the rest and stamp them out!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
